1035.name: Emberknife
1035.desc:
8% Omnivamp vs. Monsters
  • Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them for (60 + 30% Ability Power + 5% bonus Attack Damage + 2% bonus Health) magic damage over 5 seconds.
  • Challenging Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Challenging Smite and increases its damage to monsters. Challenging Smite marks champions for 4 seconds. During this time, you deal 48 - 125 (based on level) bonus true damage to them over 2.5 seconds on hit and take 20% reduced damage from them.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen up to 8 - 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the Jungle or River.

    Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.
    Only attacks and abilities apply Challenging Smite's burn

Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

8220.name: The Calamity
8220.tooltip:
The Calamity
+0 Attack Damage or +0 Ability Power, Adaptive

8224.name: Nullifying Orb
8224.desc:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s
8224.tooltip:
Nullifying Orb
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s

8226.name: Manaflow Band
8226.desc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds
8226.tooltip:
Manaflow Band
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds

8229.name: Arcane Comet
8229.desc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.
8229.tooltip:
Arcane Comet
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.

8230.name: Phase Rush
8230.desc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 15 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.
This is increased to 30 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.
Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 10s - 30s
8230.tooltip:

This is increased to 30 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.
Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 10s - 30s

8232.name: Waterwalking
8232.desc:
Gain 25 Move Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.
8232.tooltip:
Waterwalking

May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.

8233.name: Absolute Focus
8233.desc:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.
8233.tooltip:
Absolute Focus
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.

8234.name: Celerity
8234.desc: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
8234.tooltip:
Celerity
All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain 1% Move Speed.

8236.name: Gathering Storm
8236.desc:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...

Gathering Storm

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...

8237.name: Scorch
8237.desc:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 15 - 35 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s
8237.tooltip:
Scorch
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 15 - 35 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s

8242.name: Unflinching
8242.desc: Gain 10% Tenacity and 10% Slow Resist. These values increase by up to an additional 20% Tenacity and 20% Slow Resist based on missing health. Maximum value achieved at 30% health.
8242.tooltip:
Unflinching
Gain 10% Tenacity and 10% Slow Resist. These values increase by up to an additional 20% Tenacity and 20% Slow Resist based on missing health. Maximum value achieved at 30% health.

8275.name: Nimbus Cloak
8275.desc:
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 5% - 25% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).
8275.tooltip:
Nimbus Cloak
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 5% - 25% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).

8299.name: Last Stand
8299.desc: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.
8299.tooltip:
Last Stand
Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.

8304.name: Magical Footwear
8304.desc:
You get free Slightly Magical Footwear at 12 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 45s sooner.

Slightly Magical Footwear grants you an additional 10 Move Speed.
8304.tooltip:
Magical Footwear
You get free Slightly Magical Footwear at 12 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 45s sooner.

Slightly Magical Footwear grants you an additional 10 Move Speed.

8306.name: Hextech Flashtraption
8306.desc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.
8306.tooltip:
Hextech Flashtraption
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

8313.name: Perfect Timing
8313.desc:
Begin the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Each takedown you acquire reduces this timer by 120 seconds.

Stopwatch can be used for a one time 2.5 second Stasis effect.
8313.tooltip:
Perfect Timing
Begin the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Each takedown you acquire reduces this timer by 120 seconds.

Stopwatch can be used for a one time 2.5 second Stasis effect.

8316.name: Minion Dematerializer
8316.desc:
Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 180s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +6% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +3% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.
8316.tooltip:
Minion Dematerializer
Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 180s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +6% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +3% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.

8318.name: The Ruthless Visionary
8318.tooltip:

+0 Attack Damage or +0 Ability Power, Adaptive

8319.name: The Stargazer
8319.tooltip:

+0 Attack Damage or +0 Ability Power, Adaptive

8320.name: The Timeless
8320.tooltip:
The Timeless

8321.name: Future's Market
8321.desc:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Lending Fee: 50 gold
Debt limit: 150 + 5/min
(Debt doesn't become available until 2 minutes)
8321.tooltip:
Future's Market
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Lending Fee: 50 gold
Debt limit: 150 + 5/min
(Debt doesn't become available until 2 minutes)

8339.name: Celestial Body
8339.desc:
+100 Health permanently
-10% damage to champions and monsters until 10 min


'The greatest legends live on in the stars.'
—Daphna the Dreamer
8339.tooltip:
Celestial Body
+100 Health permanently
-10% damage to champions and monsters until 10 min


'The greatest legends live on in the stars.'
—Daphna the Dreamer

8345.name: Biscuit Delivery
8345.desc:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 2 mins, until 6 min.

Biscuits restore 10% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 50.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 12% missing health instead.
8345.tooltip:
Biscuit Delivery
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 2 mins, until 6 min.

Biscuits restore 10% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 50.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 12% missing health instead.

8347.tooltip:
Cosmic Insight
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste

8351.name: Glacial Augment
8351.desc:
Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays to emanate from them towards you and other nearby champions, creating frozen zones for 3 (+ 100% of the immobilizing effect's duration) seconds that slow enemies for 30% (+9% per 10% Heal and Shield Power) (+3% per 100 Ability Power) (+4% per 100 bonus Attack Damage) and reduce their damage by 15% against your allies (not including yourself).

25s cooldown.
8351.tooltip:
Glacial Augment
Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays to emanate from them towards you and other nearby champions, creating frozen zones for 3 (+ 100% of the immobilizing effect's duration) seconds that slow enemies for 30% (+9% per 10% Heal and Shield Power) (+3% per 100 Ability Power) (+4% per 100 bonus Attack Damage) and reduce their damage by 15% against your allies (not including yourself).

25s cooldown.

8352.name: Time Warp Tonic
8352.desc: Consuming a potion or biscuit grants 50% of its health or mana restoration immediately. In addition, gain 5% Move Speed while under their effects.
8352.tooltip:
Time Warp Tonic
Consuming a potion or biscuit grants 50% of its health or mana restoration immediately. In addition, gain 5% Move Speed while under their effects.

8358.name: Prototype: Omnistone
8358.desc:
Periodically grants a single use of another random keystone.

5-3 second cooldown between using a keystone and gaining the next. (9-7 seconds for ranged users)


After 40 seconds of not using a given keystone, Omnistone will re-roll when you exit champion combat.
Aftershock is only available to champions who have learned a basic spell that can trigger it.
Predator is only available to champions who have already purchased boots.
8358.tooltip:
Prototype: Omnistone
Periodically grants a single use of another random keystone.

5-3 second cooldown between using a keystone and gaining the next. (9-7 seconds for ranged users)


After 40 seconds of not using a given keystone, Omnistone will re-roll when you exit champion combat.
Aftershock is only available to champions who have learned a basic spell that can trigger it.

8359.name: Kleptomancy
8359.desc:
After using an ability, each of your next 2 attacks can grant 5 gold... or something nicer.

Only attacks against champions grant you a reward.
8359.tooltip:
Kleptomancy
After using an ability, each of your next 2 attacks can grant 5 gold... or something nicer.

Only attacks against champions grant you a reward.

8360.name: Unsealed Spellbook
8360.desc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.
Smite damage increases after two Summoner Spell swaps.
8360.tooltip:
Unsealed Spellbook

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.
Smite damage increases after two Summoner Spell swaps.

8369.name: First Strike
8369.desc:
Attacks or abilities against an enemy champion within 0.25s of entering champion combat grants 5 gold and First Strike for 3 seconds, causing you to deal 10% extra damage against champions, and granting 100% (70% for ranged champions) of bonus damage dealt as gold.

Cooldown: 25-15
8369.tooltip:
First Strike
Attacks or abilities against an enemy champion within 0.25s of entering champion combat grants 5 gold and First Strike for 3 seconds, causing you to deal 10% extra damage against champions, and granting 100% (70% for ranged champions) of bonus damage dealt as gold.

While shielded, gain 1 - 10 Armor and Magic Resist based on Level.

Whenever you gain a new shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals 5 - 30 (+1.5% Bonus Health) (+8.5% New Shield Amount) bonus adaptive damage.

You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.
8401.tooltip:
Shield Bash
While shielded, gain 1 - 10 Armor and Magic Resist based on Level.

Whenever you gain a new shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals 5 - 30 (+1.5% Bonus Health) (+8.5% New Shield Amount) bonus adaptive damage.

You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.

Activation Range for CC from allies: 1000
8410.tooltip:
Approach Velocity

Heal effects from consumables, heals for at least 20 health and shields increase your Armor by 5% for 3s.
8430.tooltip:
Iron Skin
Gain +5 Armor.

Heal effects from consumables, heals for at least 20 health and shields increase your Armor by 5% for 3s.

Heal effects from consumables, heals for at least 20 health and shields increase your Magic Resist by 5% for 3s.

8437.desc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.
8437.tooltip:

  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

8439.name: Aftershock
8439.desc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)
8439.tooltip:
Aftershock

8446.tooltip:

Absorb life essence from monsters or enemy minions that die near you, permanently gaining 3 maximum health for every 8.

When you've absorbed 120 monsters or enemy minions, gain an additional 3.5% maximum health.
8451.tooltip:

8453.tooltip:
Revitalize

8454.name: The Leviathan

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health over 2s.
8463.tooltip:
Font of Life
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health over 2s.

8465.name: Guardian
8465.desc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 50 - 130 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage
8465.tooltip:
Guardian

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 50 - 130 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

8472.name: Chrysalis
8472.desc: Start the game with 40 bonus health. When you get 4 takedowns, convert that health for an <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> bonus of 6 Attack Damage or 10 Ability Power.
8472.tooltip:
Chrysalis
Start the game with 40 bonus health. When you get 4 takedowns, convert that health for an adaptive bonus of 6 Attack Damage or 10 Ability Power.

8473.name: Bone Plating
8473.desc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s
8473.tooltip:
Bone Plating
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s

9101.name: Overheal
9101.desc:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+10% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.
9101.tooltip:
Overheal
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+10% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.

9103.name: Legend: Bloodline
9103.desc:
Gain 0.6% lifesteal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
9103.tooltip:
Legend: Bloodline
Gain 0.6% lifesteal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

9104.name: Legend: Alacrity
9104.desc:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
9104.tooltip:
Legend: Alacrity
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

9105.name: Legend: Tenacity
9105.desc:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 2.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
9105.tooltip:
Legend: Tenacity

9111.name: Triumph
9111.desc:
Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner
9111.tooltip:
Triumph
Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner

9923.name: Hail of Blades
9923.desc:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 12s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
9923.tooltip:
Hail of Blades
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 12s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

SummonerBarrier.name: Barrier
SummonerBarrier.desc: Shields your champion from 115-455 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.
SummonerBarrier.tooltip:
Barrier
Shields your champion from 115-455 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.

SummonerBoost.name: Cleanse
SummonerBoost.desc: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.
SummonerBoost.tooltip:
Cleanse
Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.

SummonerDot.name: Ignite
SummonerDot.desc: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.
SummonerDot.tooltip:
Ignite
Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.

SummonerExhaust.name: Exhaust
SummonerExhaust.desc: Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Move Speed by 30%, and their damage dealt by 40% for 3 seconds.
SummonerExhaust.tooltip:
Exhaust
Exhausts target enemy champion, reducing their Move Speed by 30%, and their damage dealt by 40% for 3 seconds.

SummonerFlash.name: Flash
SummonerFlash.desc: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.
SummonerFlash.tooltip:
Flash
Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

SummonerHaste.name: Ghost
SummonerHaste.desc: For 10 seconds, your champion can move through units and gains 24 - 48% Move Speed (depending on champion level). Ghost extends its duration on takedown.
SummonerHaste.tooltip:
Ghost
For 10 seconds, your champion can move through units and gains 24 - 48% Move Speed (depending on champion level). Ghost extends its duration on takedown.

SummonerHeal.name: Heal
SummonerHeal.desc: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Move Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.
SummonerHeal.tooltip:
Heal
Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Move Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

SummonerMana.name: Clarity
SummonerMana.desc: Restores 50% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 25% of their maximum Mana.
SummonerMana.tooltip:
Clarity
