SummonerPoroRecall.name: To the King!
SummonerPoroRecall.desc: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.
SummonerPoroRecall.tooltip:
To the King!
Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.

SummonerPoroThrow.name: Poro Toss
SummonerPoroThrow.desc: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.
SummonerPoroThrow.tooltip:
Poro Toss
Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.

SummonerSmite.name: Smite
SummonerSmite.desc: Deals 450 true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or minion. Holds two charges (90s Recharge Time)
SummonerSmite.tooltip:
Smite
Deals 450 true damage to target epic, large, or medium monster or minion. Holds two charges (90s Recharge Time)

SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.name: Mark
SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.desc: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
SummonerSnowURFSnowball_Mark.tooltip:
Mark
Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.

SummonerSnowball.name: Mark
SummonerSnowball.desc: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
SummonerSnowball.tooltip:
Mark
Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.

SummonerTeleport.name: Teleport
SummonerTeleport.desc: After channeling for 4 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure. Upgrades to Unleashed Teleport at 14 minutes, which teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.
SummonerTeleport.tooltip:
Teleport
After channeling for 4 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure. Upgrades to Unleashed Teleport at 14 minutes, which teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.

Summoner_UltBookPlaceholder.name: Placeholder
Summoner_UltBookPlaceholder.desc: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate selected at the start of the game. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!
Summoner_UltBookPlaceholder.tooltip:
Placeholder
This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate selected at the start of the game. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!

Summoner_UltBookSmitePlaceholder.name: Placeholder and Attack-Smite
Summoner_UltBookSmitePlaceholder.desc: This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate and you will gain Attack-Smite. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!
Summoner_UltBookSmitePlaceholder.tooltip:
Placeholder and Attack-Smite
This slot will be replaced by another champion's ultimate and you will gain Attack-Smite. There will be 30 seconds to select an ultimate. Be prepared!

P.name: Pyromania
P.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.
P.tooltip: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.

Q.name: Disintegrate
Q.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
Q.tooltip: Annie hurls a fireball, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. If the target dies, Annie refunds the Mana cost and reduces the Cooldown by 50%.

W.name: Incinerate
W.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
W.tooltip: Annie projects a wave of fire, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

E.name: Molten Shield
E.description: Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who attack her with basic attacks.
E.tooltip: Annie grants herself or an ally <shield>? Shield</shield> for ? seconds and <speed>? Move Speed</speed> decaying over ? seconds. While the shield holds, enemies who Attack it take <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

R.name: Summon: Tibbers
R.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
R.tooltip:
Annie summons her bear Tibbers, dealing ? magic damage. For the next ? seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for ? magic damage per second and his Attacks deal ? magic damage. Annie can Recast this ability to direct Tibbers.

If Annie dies, Tibbers becomes enraged, gaining 275% Attack Speed and 100% Move Speed decaying over 3 seconds.

P.name: Berserker Rage
P.description: Olaf gains Attack Speed based on his missing Health.
P.tooltip: Olaf gains Attack Speed based on his missing Health.

Q.name: Undertow
Q.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
Q.tooltip:
Olaf throws an axe, dealing ? physical damage and Slowing by 25/30/35/40/45% for between 1.5 and 2.5 seconds, based on distance travelled.

If Olaf picks up the axe, this Ability's Cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

W.name: Vicious Strikes
W.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.
W.tooltip: For ? seconds, Olaf gains <lifeSteal>?% Life Steal</lifeSteal>, <attackSpeed>?% Attack Speed</attackSpeed>, and increases healing received by up to <healing>?% (based on missing Health)</healing>.

E.name: Reckless Swing
E.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
E.tooltip:
Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing ? true damage. If the enemy dies, the cost is refunded.

Attacks lower the Cooldown of this Ability by 1 second.

R.name: Ragnarok
R.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
R.tooltip:
Passive: Olaf gains ? Armor and ? Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf ends all Immobilizing and Disabling effects on himself and can't be affected by them for the next ? seconds. While active, Olaf loses this Ability's Armor and Magic Resist and instead gains ? Attack Damage. Olaf also gains ?% Move Speed towards enemy champions for ? second.

P.name: Colossal Smash
P.description: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.
P.tooltip: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.

Q.name: Winds of War
Q.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado that deals damage over time.
Q.tooltip: Galio fires two windblasts that deal <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> each. When the windblasts meet, they combine into a tornado that deals <magicDamage>?% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> over ? seconds.

W.name: Shield of Durand
W.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Galio gains a ? Magic Shield after not taking damage for ? seconds.

Begin Charging: Galio reduces incoming magic damage by ? and incoming physical damage by ? and Slows himself by 15%.

Release: Galio Taunts enemy champions for between 0.5 to 1.5 seconds, deals between ? and ? magic damage, and refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds. Taunt duration, damage, and range increase with charge time.

E.name: Justice Punch
E.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
E.tooltip:
Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, Knocking Up for ? seconds and dealing ? magic damage to the first champion hit. Other enemies in the way take ? magic damage.

Galio's dash stops on hitting terrain.

R.name: Hero's Entrance
R.description: Galio designates an ally's position as his landing spot, granting all allies in the area a magic shield. After a delay Galio smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.
R.tooltip:
Galio designates an allied champion's position as his landing spot, granting all allied champions in the area Shield of Durand's passive Shield for ? seconds. Galio then flies to his landing zone.

When Galio lands, he Knocks Up for ? seconds and deals ? magic damage.

P.name: Loaded Dice
P.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.
P.tooltip: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.

Q.name: Wild Cards
Q.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
Q.tooltip: Twisted Fate throws three cards that deal <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> each.

W.name: Pick a Card
W.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
W.tooltip:
Twisted Fate begins shuffling his deck, allowing him to Recast to lock in one of three cards and enhance his next Attack.
  • The Blue Card deals ? magic damage and restores 50/75/100/125/150 Mana.
  • The Red Card deals ? to nearby enemies and Slows by 30/35/40/45/50% for 2.5 seconds.
  • The Gold Card deals ? and Stuns for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.

E.name: Stacked Deck
E.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
E.tooltip:
Passive: Every 4th Attack deals an additional ? magic damage.

Twisted Fate also gains ?% Attack Speed.

R.name: Destiny
R.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
R.tooltip:
Twisted Fate focuses on his cards, granting True Sight of all enemy champions on the map for 6/8/10 seconds and allowing him to Recast.

Recast: Twisted Fate teleports up to 5500 units away.

P.name: Determination
P.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.
P.tooltip: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

Q.name: Three Talon Strike
Q.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
Q.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 Attacks deal an additional ? physical damage and reduces his other Ability's Cooldowns by 1 second. The third Attack also Knocks Up for 0.75 seconds.

W.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
W.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies and marking them as Challenged.
W.tooltip:
Xin Zhao slashes, dealing ? physical damage, then thrusts, dealing ?. Enemies hit by the thrust are Slowed by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

Champions and Large Monsters hit by the thrust are marked as Challenged for ? seconds.

E.name: Audacious Charge
E.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, gaining increased Attack Speed and dealing damage to all enemies in the area, slowing them briefly. Audacious Charge gains increased range against Challenged targets.
E.tooltip:
Xin Zhao charges an enemy, dealing ? magic damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by ?% for 0.5 seconds.

Xin Zhao also grants himself 40/45/50/55/60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

Audacious Charge's range is increased on enemies that are Challenged.

R.name: Crescent Guard
R.description: Xin Zhao challenges an enemy he damaged recently. Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back, becoming impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
R.tooltip:
The last champion Xin Zhao damaged with an Attack or Audacious Charge is Challenged for ? seconds.

Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals ? plus ?% current Health physical damage and Knocks Back all non-Challenged enemies.

Afterwards, Xin Zhao becomes immune to damage from enemies outside the sweep range for ? seconds.

P.name: Echoing Flames
P.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.
P.tooltip: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

Q.name: Corrosive Charge
Q.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
Q.tooltip: Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by ?% for ? seconds.

W.name: Purge
W.description: Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Urgot's other Abilities mark the last champion hit for 5 seconds.

Active: Urgot begins firing his chain gun at the closest enemy, prioritizing marked enemies. He Attacks them 3 times a second dealing ? physical damage per shot. Urgot can move while firing and has 40% Slow resistance, but loses 125 Move Speed.

At max rank, this Ability lasts indefinitely and can be Toggled on and off.

E.name: Disdain
E.description: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.
E.tooltip: Urgot charges forward, gaining <shield>? Shield</shield> for ? seconds. The first champion hit is <status>Stunned</status> and thrown behind Urgot. All enemies Urgot collides with take <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>.

R.name: Fear Beyond Death
R.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
R.tooltip:
Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first champion hit, dealing ? physical damage and Slowing for ? seconds by 1% per 1% missing Health, up to ?%.

If the impaled victim falls below ?% Health, Urgot can Recast this Ability, Suppressing the victim and dragging them to himself. On reaching Urgot, they are killed and nearby enemies are Feared for ? seconds.

P.name: Mirror Image
P.description: When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.
P.tooltip: When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

Q.name: Sigil of Malice
Q.description: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage.
Q.tooltip:
LeBlanc projects a sigil to an enemy, dealing ? magic damage and marking them for ? seconds.

Damaging the marked enemy with an Ability detonates the sigil, dealing ? magic damage.

W.name: Distortion
W.description: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.
W.tooltip:
LeBlanc dashes then deals ? magic damage to nearby enemies. For 4 seconds after dashing, LeBlanc can Recast.

Recast: LeBlanc returns to her starting location.

E.name: Ethereal Chains
E.description: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.
E.tooltip:
LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit, dealing ? magic damage and granting True Sight.

If they remain shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc Roots them for 1.5 seconds and deals an additional ? magic damage.

R.name: Mimic
R.description: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.
R.tooltip:
LeBlanc mimics her most recent Ability, using it again. The mimicked Ability deals increased damage.

Mimicked Sigil of Malice deals {{ rq1damage }} magic damage when applied, and {{ rq2damage }} magic damage when consumed.
Mimicked Distortion deals ? magic damage.
Mimicked Ethereal Chains deals {{ re1damage }} magic damage when shackled and {{ re2damage }} magic damage when Rooting.

P.name: Crimson Pact
P.description: Every 30 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.6 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).
P.tooltip: Every 30 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.6 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

Q.name: Transfusion
Q.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.
Q.tooltip:
Vladimir drains his target's lifeforce, dealing ? magic damage and restoring ? Health. After using this Ability twice, Vladimir gains 10% Move Speed for 0.5 seconds and empowers the next use of this Ability for 2.5 seconds.

The empowered version of this Ability deals ? magic damage instead and restores an additional ? plus ? missing Health.

W.name: Sanguine Pool
W.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
W.tooltip:
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, gaining 37.5% decaying Move Speed for 1 second and becoming Untargetable and Ghosted while Slowing enemies in the pool by 40%.

Vladimir deals ? magic damage over the duration and restores Health equal to 15% of the damage dealt.

E.name: Tides of Blood
E.description: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.
E.tooltip:
Begin Charging: Vladimir charges up a reservoir of blood, spending up to ? Health. While at full charge, Vladimir is Slowed by 20%.

Release: Vladimir unleashes a torrent of blood missiles at surrounding enemies, dealing between ? and ? magic damage based on charge time. If this Ability was charged for at least 1 second, it also Slows targets by 40/45/50/55/60% for 0.5 seconds.

R.name: Hemoplague
R.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.
R.tooltip: Vladimir creates a virulent plague, causing its victims to take 10% increased damage from all sources for 4 seconds. After it expires, Vladimir deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to all infected targets. Vladimir restores <healing>? Health</healing> if he hits a champion, and restores an additional <healing>? Health</healing> for each champion beyond the first.

P.name: A Harmless Scarecrow
P.description: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.
P.tooltip: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.

Q.name: Terrify
Q.description: Fiddlesticks damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
Q.tooltip:
Passive: While unseen and out of combat or impersonating an Effigy, damaging an enemy with an ability Fears them for ? second(s).

Active: Fear an enemy for ? second(s) and deal ? current Health magic damage. If the target has recently been Feared by Fiddlesticks, instead deal ? current Health magic damage.

W.name: Bountiful Harvest
W.description: Fiddlesticks drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration.
W.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks channels and drains the souls of nearby enemies, dealing ? magic damage per second for 2 seconds, plus ?% missing Health magic damage at the end. Fiddlesticks restores ?% of damage as Health.

If Fiddlesticks ends the channel without interruption, the remaining Cooldown is reduced by 60%.

E.name: Reap
E.description: Fiddlesticks slashes an area with its scythe, slowing all enemies hit and silencing enemies hit in the center of the slash.
E.tooltip: Fiddlesticks unleashes dark magic, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by ?% for ? seconds. Enemies in the center are also <status>Silenced</status> for the duration.

R.name: Crowstorm
R.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
R.tooltip: Fiddlesticks channels for ? seconds, then teleports and unleashes a murder of crows, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> over ? seconds.

P.name: Divine Ascent
P.description: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Move Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks.
P.tooltip: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Move Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks.

Q.name: Radiant Blast
Q.description: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.
Q.tooltip: Kayle fires a celestial sword that stops on the first enemy hit, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Slowing</status> by ?% for ? seconds, and removing <scaleArmor>?% Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR> for ? seconds from the target and enemies behind them.

W.name: Celestial Blessing
W.description: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants Move Speed to herself and the nearest ally.
W.tooltip: Kayle infuses herself and an allied champion with light, restoring <healing>? Health</healing> and granting <speed>? Move Speed</speed> for ? seconds.

E.name: Starfire Spellblade
E.description:
Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks.

Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.
E.tooltip:
Passive: Kayle's Attacks deal an additional ? magic damage.

Active: Kayle's next Attack becomes ranged and deals an additional ? missing Health magic damage. When Kayle reaches level ?, this Attack explodes on hitting the target, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.

R.name: Divine Judgment
R.description: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.
R.tooltip: Kayle makes an allied champion Invulnerable for ? seconds. She then purifies the area around them dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to nearby enemies.

P.name: Double Strike
P.description: Every few consecutive basic attack, Master Yi strikes twice.
P.tooltip: Every few consecutive basic attack, Master Yi strikes twice.

Q.name: Alpha Strike
Q.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
Q.tooltip:
Master Yi becomes Untargetable and teleports to rapidly strike enemies near his target, dealing ? physical damage to all enemies hit after ? hits.

This Ability can strike the same enemy repeatedly if there are no other targets, dealing ? physical damage for subsequent hits.

W.name: Meditate
W.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
W.tooltip: Master Yi channels, reducing incoming damage by ?% and restoring <healing>? Health</healing> over ? seconds. This healing is increased by up to ?% based on Master Yi's missing Health.

E.name: Wuju Style
E.description: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.
E.tooltip: Master Yi's Attacks deal an additional <trueDamage>? true damage</trueDamage> for ? seconds.

R.name: Highlander
R.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Move Speed and Attack Speed as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
R.tooltip:
Passive: Champion takedowns reduce the remaining Cooldown of Master Yi's basic Abilities by ?%.

Active: Master Yi enters a trance, gaining ?% Move Speed, ?% Attack Speed, and immunity to Slows for ? seconds. Champion takedowns extend the duration of this Ability by ? seconds.

P.name: Triumphant Roar
P.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.
P.tooltip: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.

Q.name: Pulverize
Q.description: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.
Q.tooltip: Alistar smashes the ground, <status>Knocking Up</status> enemies for 1 second and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

W.name: Headbutt
W.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
W.tooltip: Alistar rams into an enemy, <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Back</status> and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

E.name: Trample
E.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
E.tooltip:
Alistar begins trampling the ground, becoming Ghosted and dealing ? magic damage over 5 seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages a champion grants a stack.

At 5 stacks, Alistar's next Attack Stuns for 1 second and deals an additional ? magic damage.

R.name: Unbreakable Will
R.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
R.tooltip: Alistar immediately cleanses all <status>Disabling</status> effects and takes ?% reduced damage for ? seconds.

P.name: Arcane Mastery
P.description: <mainText>Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.</mainText>
P.tooltip: <mainText>Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.</mainText>

Q.name: Overload
Q.description:
Passively, Ryze's other basic abilities reset the cooldown of Overload and charge a rune. When Ryze casts Overload with 2 runes charged, he gains a brief burst of Move Speed.

On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If the target has Flux on it, Overload deals extra damage and bounces to nearby enemies with Flux.
Q.tooltip:
Passive: Rune Prison and Spell Flux refresh this Ability's Cooldown and charge a rune for ? seconds (max ? runes).

Active: Ryze unleashes a blast, dealing ? magic damage to the first enemy hit. If the target has Flux on it, it is consumed, causing this Ability to deal ?% increased damage and bounces to nearby enemies with Flux.

Ryze also discharges all runes, granting Ryze ?% Move Speed for ? seconds if ? runes were charged.

W.name: Rune Prison
W.description: Ryze traps a target in a cage of runes, damaging them and slowing their movement. If the target has Flux on it, they are instead rooted.
W.tooltip: Ryze deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> by ?% for ? seconds. If the target has <keywordMajor>Flux</keywordMajor>, it is consumed and this Ability <status>Roots</status> instead of <status>Slowing</status>.

E.name: Spell Flux
E.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs all nearby enemies. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.
E.tooltip: Ryze fires an orb, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and applies <keywordMajor>Flux</keywordMajor> for ? seconds to the target and nearby enemies. Enemies already afflicted with <keywordMajor>Flux</keywordMajor> will cause it to spread further.

R.name: Realm Warp
R.description:
Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux.

On cast, Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.
R.tooltip:
Passive: Overload damage bonus against targets with Flux increased to ?%.

Active: Ryze opens a portal to another location. After ? seconds, all allies near the portal are teleported to that location.

P.name: Glory in Death
P.description: After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.
P.tooltip: After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.

Q.name: Decimating Smash
Q.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.
Q.tooltip:
Begin Charging: Sion charges a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds.

Release: Sion slams his axe down, briefly Slowing and dealing between ? and ? physical damage based on charge time. If Sion charged for at least 1 second, enemies are Knocked Up and Stunned for between 1.25 to 2.25 seconds based on charge time.

W.name: Soul Furnace
W.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Sion gains 4 max Health when he kills a unit, or 15 for champion takedowns, large minions and large monsters.

Active: Sion gains ? Shield for 6 seconds. After 3 seconds if the shield still holds, Sion can Recast to detonate the shield to deal ? plus 10/11/12/13/14% max Health magic damage

E.name: Roar of the Slayer
E.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.
E.tooltip: Sion fires a shockwave, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Slowing</status> them by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2.5 seconds and removing <scaleArmor>20% Armor</scaleArmor> for 2.5 seconds. Non-champions hit are <status>Knocked Back</status>. Enemies hit by a <status>Knocked Back</status> unit take the same damage and effects.

R.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
R.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.
R.tooltip:
Sion charges Unstoppably in a direction for 8 seconds, turning towards the mouse cursor. Sion stops on colliding with an enemy champion or wall or on Recasting this Ability.

At the end of the charge, Sion deals between ? and ? physical damage based on distance travelled. Enemies close to Sion are Stunned for between ? and ? seconds based on distance travelled. Enemies in a larger area are Slowed by ?% for 3 seconds

P.name: Fleet of Foot
P.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
P.tooltip: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

Q.name: Boomerang Blade
Q.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
Q.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> to all enemies it cuts through before returning, dealing damage a second time. This Ability deals ?% less damage per non-champion hit, down to a minimum of ?%.

W.name: Ricochet
W.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
W.tooltip:
Sivir's next ? Attacks bounce to nearby enemies, dealing ? physical damage to the initial target and ? physical damage to each subsequent target.

If a given Attack critically strikes its first target, all subsequent bounces from that Attack will also critically strike.

E.name: Spell Shield
E.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
E.tooltip: Sivir creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy Ability. If an Ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains <scaleMana>110/120/130/140/150 Mana</scaleMana>.

R.name: On The Hunt
R.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Move Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
R.tooltip:
Passive: Sivir gains ?% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

Active: Sivir rallies her allies for ? seconds, granting all nearby allies ?% Move Speed decaying over ? seconds.

P.name: Salvation
P.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.
P.tooltip: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

Q.name: Starcall
Q.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health.
Q.tooltip:
Soraka calls down a star, dealing ? magic damage and Slowing by ?% for ? seconds.

Hitting an enemy champion grants Soraka Rejuvenation, which restores ? Health over ? seconds and grants ?% Move Speed decaying over the same duration.

W.name: Astral Infusion
W.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
W.tooltip:
Soraka restores ? Health to another allied champion.

If Soraka is affected by Rejuvenation, the Health cost will be reduced by ?%, and the target will gain Rejuvenation for ? seconds.

E.name: Equinox
E.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
E.tooltip: Soraka creates a starfield that deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to champions. The field lingers for ? seconds, <status>Silencing</status> enemies inside. When the zone disappears, champions inside the zone are <status>Rooted</status> for ? second(s) and take <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

R.name: Wish
R.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
R.tooltip: Soraka calls upon divine powers, clearing <status>Grievous Wounds</status> from all allied champions and restoring <healing>? Health</healing> to them, regardless of distance. Healing is increased to <healing>?</healing> on targets below 40% Health.

P.name: Guerrilla Warfare
P.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.
P.tooltip: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.

Q.name: Blinding Dart
Q.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.
Q.tooltip: Teemo fires a dart, <status>Blinding</status> the target for ? seconds and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

W.name: Move Quick
W.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Move Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Move Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo gains ?% Move Speed while he hasn't been damaged by a champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining ?% Move Speed that is not lost when struck for ? seconds.

E.name: Toxic Shot
E.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
E.tooltip: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Teemo's Attacks apply poison, dealing an additional <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> plus <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> over ? seconds.

R.name: Noxious Trap
R.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
R.tooltip:
Teemo tosses a mushroom trap that detonates when stepped on. The traps Slow by ?% and deal ? magic damage over ? seconds. Enemies are revealed for the same duration.

Traps last ? minutes and are stealthed. A mushroom tossed onto another mushroom bounces before landing at its position. This Ability has ? charges (? second refresh).

P.name: Draw a Bead
P.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.
P.tooltip: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

Q.name: Rapid Fire
Q.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
Q.tooltip: Tristana goes full-auto, gaining <attackSpeed>50/65/80/95/110% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for 7 seconds.

W.name: Rocket Jump
W.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
W.tooltip:
Tristana launches herself, dealing ? magic damage and Slowing by 60% for 1/1.5/2/2.5/3 seconds upon landing.

Champion takedowns and max stack Explosive Charge detonations on champions refresh this Ability's Cooldown.

E.name: Explosive Charge
E.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
E.tooltip:
Passive: Tristana's Attacks that kill enemies deal ? magic damage to surrounding enemies.

Active: Tristana attaches a bomb to an enemy or turret that deals ? physical damage to surrounding enemies after ? seconds. The damage is increased by ?% Critical Strike Chance and by ?% each time Tristana hits an Attack or Ability (max 4 stacks).

At ? stacks, the bomb explodes immediately (max ? physical damage).

R.name: Buster Shot
R.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
R.tooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to the target and <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Back</status> along with surrounding enemies.

P.name: Eternal Hunger
P.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.
P.tooltip: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

Q.name: Jaws of the Beast
Q.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
Q.tooltip:
Tap: Warwick lunges forward and bites, dealing ? plus 6/7/8/9/10% max Health magic damage and restoring 30/45/60/75/90% of damage dealt as Health.

Hold: Warwick lunges and clamps his jaws on the target, leaping behind them. While clamped, Warwick follows all movement of the target. After releasing his hold, he does the same damage and healing.

W.name: Blood Hunt
W.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Warwick can sense champions below 50% Health, gaining 35/40/45/50/55% Move Speed towards them and gaining 70/80/90/100/110% Attack Speed against them. These bonuses are tripled against enemies below 20% Health.

Active: Warwick can briefly sense all enemies, and gains this Ability's passive effect against the closest champion for 8 seconds, regardless of Health. Warwick cannot use this Ability while in combat with champions.

E.name: Primal Howl
E.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
E.tooltip: Warwick gains 35/40/45/50/55% damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. After it ends, Warwick howls, <status>Fearing</status> nearby enemies for 1 second. Warwick can <recast>Recast</recast> to end the Ability early.

R.name: Infinite Duress
R.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus Move Speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
R.tooltip: Warwick leaps a huge distance that scales with his <speed>Move Speed</speed>, <status>Suppressing</status> the first champion he collides with while he channels for ? seconds. He attacks that champion 3 times over the duration, applying %i:OnHit% <OnHit>On-Hit</OnHit> effects and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. Warwick restores <healing>100% of all damage dealt</healing> during the channel as Health.

P.name: Call of the Freljord
P.description: Nunu increases the attack speed and Move Speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.
P.tooltip: Nunu increases the attack speed and Move Speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.

Q.name: Consume
Q.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.
Q.tooltip:
Nunu asks Willump to take a bite of an enemy, dealing ? true damage and restoring ? Health when used against a minion or jungle monster. Against a champion, it instead deals ? magic damage and restores ? Health.

The healing is increased by ?% when Nunu and Willump are below ?% Health.

W.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
W.description: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.
W.tooltip:
Nunu and Willump create a snowball that grows in size and speed as they roll it. They turn slower while rolling it, but can increase turning speed by holding the turn.

The snowball does between ? and ? magic damage, and Knocks Up for between ? and ? seconds when it collides with a champion, large monster or wall. These values scale up with distance rolled.

Nunu and Willump can Recast to let the snowball go early.

E.name: Snowball Barrage
E.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.
E.tooltip:
Nunu throws three snowballs, dealing a total of ? magic damage per snowball and Slowing enemies hit by all three by ?% for ? seconds. Nunu can Recast this up to twice more.

After ? seconds, Nunu Roots all nearby enemies that had been Slowed by the snowballs for ? seconds and deals an additional ? magic damage.

R.name: Absolute Zero
R.description: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.
R.tooltip:
Nunu and Willump channel a powerful blizzard for up to ? seconds. Enemies inside are Slowed by ?%, increasing to ?% over the duration. Nunu and Willump also gain ? Shield for the duration before decaying over ? seconds afterwards.

When the blizzard ends, it detonates, dealing between ? and ? magic damage based on channel time. Nunu and Willump can Recast to end the blizzard early.

P.name: Love Tap
P.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.
P.tooltip: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.

Q.name: Double Up
Q.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
Q.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot, dealing ? physical damage to an enemy and to another one behind them.

The second shot can critically strike. It always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

W.name: Strut
W.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Move Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
W.tooltip:
Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking damage, Miss Fortune gains ? Move Speed. After another 5 seconds, it increases to ?.

Active: Gain the passive effect's full Move Speed bonus and 40/55/70/85/100% Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

Love Taps reduce the Cooldown of this Ability by ? seconds.

E.name: Make It Rain
E.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
E.tooltip: Miss Fortune rains bullets, revealing an area, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> over 2 seconds and <status>Slowing</status> by 40/45/50/55/60%.

R.name: Bullet Time
R.description: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike
R.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets, firing ? waves over ? seconds, dealing ? physical damage per wave (total ? physical damage).

Each wave of this ability can critically strike for ? damage.

P.name: Frost Shot
P.description:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.
P.tooltip:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

Q.name: Ranger's Focus
Q.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
Q.tooltip:
Passive: Ashe's Attacks grant a stack for 4 seconds. At 4 stacks, she may activate this ability.

Active: Ashe gains 20/25/30/35/40% Attack Speed and her Attacks deal ? damage instead for 4 seconds.

W.name: Volley
W.description: Ashe fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
W.tooltip: Ashe fires a volley of ? arrows, each dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>. Enemies can be hit by multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.

E.name: Hawkshot
E.description: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
E.tooltip:
Ashe sends forth a hawk to grant vision for 5 seconds anywhere on the map. It also reveals the area around it as it flies.

This ability has 2 charges (? second recharge).

R.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
R.description: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
R.tooltip: Ashe launches a crystal arrow of ice that <status>Stuns</status> the first champion hit and deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. The <status>Stun</status> duration increases with distance travelled, up to ? seconds. Surrounding enemies take half damage.

P.name: Battle Fury
P.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.
P.tooltip: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

Q.name: Bloodlust
Q.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
Q.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining 10/15/20/25/30 Attack Damage plus 0.15/0.25/0.35/0.45/0.55 per 1% missing Health.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring ? plus 0.5/0.95/1.4/1.85/2.3 Health per Fury.

W.name: Mocking Shout
W.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Move Speed reduced.
W.tooltip: Tryndamere hurls insults, reducing champions' Attack Damage by 20/35/50/65/80 for 4 seconds. Enemies with their backs towards Tryndamere are <status>Slowed</status> by 30/37.5/45/52.5/60% for the same duration.

E.name: Spinning Slash
E.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
E.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing ? physical damage and generating ? Fury per enemy hit.

This Ability's Cooldown is reduced by 1 second when Tryndamere critically strikes, and reduced by 2 seconds when critically striking a champion.

R.name: Undying Rage
R.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
R.tooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for 5 seconds, refusing to be reduced below 30/50/70 Health, and instantly gains <keywordMajor>50/75/100 Fury</keywordMajor>.

P.name: Relentless Assault
P.description: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.
P.tooltip: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

Q.name: Leap Strike
Q.description: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.
Q.tooltip: Jax leaps to a friendly or enemy unit or ward, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> if it is an enemy.

W.name: Empower
W.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
W.tooltip:
Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next Attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional ? magic damage.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

E.name: Counter Strike
E.description: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.
E.tooltip:
Jax enters a defensive stance for up to 2 seconds, dodging incoming Attacks and taking 25% less damage from area of effect Abilities.

After 2 seconds or Recasting, Jax deals ? physical damage and Stuns nearby enemies for 1 second. Deals 20% increased damage for each Attack Jax dodged (max: 100%).

R.name: Grandmaster's Might
R.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
R.tooltip:
Passive: Every third Attack deals an additional ? magic damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him ? Armor and ? Magic Resist for ? seconds.

P.name: Soul Siphon
P.description: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and medium and larger jungler monsters.
P.tooltip: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and medium and larger jungler monsters.

Q.name: Dark Binding
Q.description: Morgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage.
Q.tooltip: Morgana hurls a blast of starfire that <status>Roots</status> the first enemy hit for ? seconds and deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

W.name: Tormented Shadow
W.description: Morgana casts a cursed shadow on an area, damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle. They receive magic damage over time, which increases the lower health they are.
W.tooltip:
Morgana ignites the ground for ? seconds, dealing ? magic damage per second, increased by up to ?% based on the targets' percentage missing health.

This Ability's Cooldown is reduced by ?% every time Morgana is healed by Soul Siphon.

E.name: Black Shield
E.description: Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.
E.tooltip: Morgana grants an ally champion <shield>? Magic Shield</shield> for ? seconds. The shield prevents <status>Disabling</status> and <status>Immobilizing</status> effects until it breaks.

R.name: Soul Shackles
R.description: Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining Move Speed towards them. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them.
R.tooltip:
Morgana chains herself to nearby enemy Champions, dealing ? magic damage and Slowing them by ?%. After ? seconds, enemies unable to break the chains take an additional ? magic damage and are Stunned for ? seconds.

While casting this Ability, Morgana gains ?% Move Speed towards enemies she has chained.

P.name: Time In A Bottle
P.description: Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.
P.tooltip: Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.

Q.name: Time Bomb
Q.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
Q.tooltip:
Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb that sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it. After 3 seconds it detonates, dealing ? magic damage.

Placing a second bomb on a unit that already has one detonates the first bomb immediately and Stuns enemies in the blast for 1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 seconds.

W.name: Rewind
W.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
W.tooltip: Zilean turns time, reducing his other basic Ability Cooldowns by 10 seconds.

E.name: Time Warp
E.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Move Speed or increasing an ally's Move Speed for a short time.
E.tooltip: Zilean <status>Slows</status> an enemy champion by 40/55/70/85/99% or grants an allied champion <speed>40/55/70/85/99% Move Speed</speed> for 2.5 seconds.

R.name: Chronoshift
R.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
R.tooltip: Zilean grants a protective time rune to an allied champion for ? seconds. If the target would die, the rune rewinds their timeline, putting them into Stasis for ? seconds, then reviving them and restoring <healing>? Health</healing>.

P.name: Noxious Slipstream
P.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.
P.tooltip: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.

Q.name: Poison Trail
Q.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
Q.tooltip: <toggle>Toggle:</toggle> Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> per second.

W.name: Mega Adhesive
W.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
W.tooltip: Singed hurls a cask of sticky liquid, <status>Grounding</status> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies in the area by 60% for 3 seconds.

E.name: Fling
E.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
E.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing ? plus 6/6.5/7/7.5/8% max Health magic damage.

If Singed flings a target into his Mega Adhesive, they are Rooted for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.

R.name: Insanity Potion
R.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds.
R.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him ? <scaleAP>Ability Power</scaleAP>, <scaleArmor>Armor</scaleArmor>, <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR>, <speed>Move Speed</speed>, <healing>Health Regen</healing>, and <scaleMana>Mana Regen</scaleMana> for ? seconds. During this effect, Singed's Poison Trail also applies ?% Grievous Wounds for ? second(s).

P.name: Demon Shade
P.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.
P.tooltip: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

Q.name: Hate Spike
Q.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.
Q.tooltip:
Evelynn strikes with her Lasher, dealing ? magic damage to the first enemy hit and causing Evelynn's next 3 Attacks or Abilities on that unit to deal an additional ? magic damage. Evelynn can Recast this Ability up to 3 times.

Recast: Evelynn fires spikes through the nearest enemy, dealing ? magic damage to all enemies hit.

W.name: Allure
W.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
W.tooltip:
Evelynn marks a champion or jungle monster for 5 seconds. If Evelynn hits the target with an Attack or Ability, she will expunge the mark, refund its cost, and Slow the target by ?% for ? seconds.

If the mark lasts at least 2.5 seconds, expunging it has extra effects:
  • Against champions: Charms them for ? second(s) and removes ?% Magic Resist for ? seconds.
  • Against jungle monsters: Charms them for ? seconds and deals ? magic damage.

E.name: Whiplash
E.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains Move Speed for a short duration.
E.tooltip:
Evelynn whips an enemy, dealing ? plus ? max Health magic damage. Evelynn gains ?% Move Speed for ? seconds.

Entering Demon Shade refreshes this Ability's cooldown and empowers it. When this Ability is empowered, Evelynn dashes to the target and deals ? plus ? max Health magic damage to her target and everyone she passes through instead.

R.name: Last Caress
R.description: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
R.tooltip: Evelynn unleashes her demonic energy, dealing heavy damage, becoming Untargetable and teleporting backwards. She deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>, increased to <magicDamage>?</magicDamage> against enemies below <healing>30% Health</healing>.

P.name: Deadly Venom
P.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.
P.tooltip: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

Q.name: Ambush
Q.description:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Move Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
Q.tooltip:
Twitch Camouflages and gains 30% Move Speed for 10/11/12/13/14 seconds. The Move Speed increases to 30% while near an enemy champion that can't see him. After exiting Camouflage, Twitch gains 40/45/50/55/60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

Enemies that remain within the cloud are Slowed by ?% and receive an additional stack of Deadly Venom each second.

E.name: Contaminate
E.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
E.tooltip:

Max Stack Damage: ? physical damage and ? magical damage.

R.name: Spray and Pray
R.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
R.tooltip: Twitch unleashes his crossbow, gaining ? Attack Range and ? Attack Damage, and causing his Attacks to become piercing bolts for ? seconds. These bolts hit all enemies they pass through, but deal ?% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of ?% damage.

P.name: Death Defied
P.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.
P.tooltip: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.

Q.name: Lay Waste
Q.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies.

Toggle: Karthus creates a necrotic aura, dealing ? magic damage per second to nearby enemies.

P.tooltip: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

W.tooltip: Cho'Gath roars, <status>Silencing</status> enemies for 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

If this kills the target, Cho'Gath gains a stack, which causes him to grow in size and gain <healing>? max Health</healing>. Only ? stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic jungle monsters.

P.tooltip: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

P.tooltip: Upon taking fatal damage, Anivia reverts to an egg and is reborn with full health.

P.tooltip: Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.

P.tooltip: Janna gains bonus Move Speed moving towards allied champions and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her.
