P.tooltip: After using 5 spells or attacks, Karma's next ability will be enhanced.

Q.name: Inner Flame
Q.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
Q.tooltip: Karma fires a blast of energy, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to the first target hit and surrounding enemies, and <status>Slowing</status> them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

W.name: Focused Resolve
W.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
W.tooltip: Karma tethers herself to a champion or jungle monster, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and revealing them for 2 seconds. If the tether remains unbroken, the target takes <magicDamage>? damage</magicDamage> again and is <status>Rooted</status> for 1.4/1.55/1.7/1.85/2 seconds.

E.name: Inspire
E.description:
Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally.

Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
E.tooltip: Karma grants an allied champion <shield>? Shield</shield> for 2.5 seconds and <speed>40% Move Speed</speed> for 1.5 seconds.

R.name: Mantra
R.description: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
R.tooltip:
Karma empowers her next Ability used within 8 seconds.
  • Inner Flame: Deals an additional ? magic damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, Slowing enemies and dealing an additional ? damage.
  • Focused Resolve: Karma will restore ? Health at the beginning and end of the tether, and Root for ? second(s) longer.
  • Inspire: Karma shields her target for ? more Shield, and also shields allies near her target, granting 30% of the total Shield and Move Speed value.

P.name: Bravado
P.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.
P.tooltip: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

Q.name: Starlight's Touch
Q.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
Q.tooltip:
Passive: Gain a stack (max 1/2/3/4/5) every ? seconds and when hitting a Bravado Attack.

Active: Consume all stacks to restore ? Health per stack to nearby ally champions (? at 1/2/3/4/5 stacks).

W.name: Bastion
W.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Taric gains ? Armor and forms a tether between him and the ally bound by this Ability. As long as they are near each other, the ally gains ? Armor and Taric casts all his Abilities from both himself and his linked ally.

Active: Taric binds to an ally champion, granting a 8/9/10/11/12% max Health Shield for 2.5 seconds.

E.name: Dazzle
E.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
E.tooltip: Taric projects a beam of starlight, bursting after 1 second to deal <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Stun</status> enemies for 1.25 seconds.

R.name: Cosmic Radiance
R.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
R.tooltip: Taric calls down protection from the heavens. After ? seconds, nearby ally champions become invulnerable for ? seconds.

P.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
P.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.
P.tooltip: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

Q.name: Baleful Strike
Q.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
Q.tooltip:
Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing ? magic damage to the first two enemies hit.

If Veigar kills an enemy with this Ability, he gains a stack of Phenomenal Evil. Large minions and large jungle monsters grant 2 additional stacks.

W.name: Dark Matter
W.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
W.tooltip:
Veigar summons dark matter from the sky, dealing ? magic damage.

Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce this Ability's Cooldown by 10%.

E.name: Event Horizon
E.description: Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.
E.tooltip: Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that <status>Stuns</status> enemies that pass through for 1.5/1.75/2/2.25/2.5 seconds. The cage lasts for 3 seconds.

R.name: Primordial Burst
R.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
R.tooltip: Veigar blasts an enemy champion with primal magic to deal between <magicDamage>? and ? magic damage</magicDamage>, increasing with the target's missing Health. Damage is maximized against enemies below 33% Health.

P.name: King's Tribute
P.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.
P.tooltip: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

Q.name: Chomp
Q.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
Q.tooltip:
Trundle's next Attack deals an additional ? physical damage and briefly Slows by 75%, then Trundle gains 20/25/30/35/40 Attack Damage for 5 seconds and the enemy loses {{ effect3amount*0.5 }} Attack Damage for the same duration.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

W.name: Frozen Domain
W.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Move Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
W.tooltip: Trundle freezes an area for 8 seconds. While inside he gains <speed>20/28/36/44/52% Move Speed</speed>, <attackSpeed>30/50/70/90/110% Attack Speed</attackSpeed>, and 25% increased healing.

E.name: Pillar of Ice
E.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
E.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar for 6 seconds, briefly <status>Knocking Back</status> enemies directly over it and <status>Slowing</status> nearby enemies by 30/34/38/42/46%.

R.name: Subjugate
R.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
R.tooltip: Trundle drains the lifeforce of an enemy champion, dealing <magicDamage>? max Health magic damage</magicDamage> and stealing <scaleArmor>?% Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR> over ? seconds.

P.name: Ravenous Flock
P.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.
P.tooltip: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health. Swain can right-click an immobilized enemy champions to pull them closer to him, dealing damage and ripping out a Soul Fragment.

Q.name: Death's Hand
Q.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.
Q.tooltip: Swain unleashes eldritch bolts, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> plus <magicDamage>? damage</magicDamage> per bolt past the first (max <magicDamage>? damage</magicDamage>).

W.name: Vision of Empire
W.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.
W.tooltip: Swain opens a demon eye, revealing a location for 1.5 seconds, then deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slows</status> by 25/35/45/55/65% for 2.5 seconds. Champions hit grant Swain a <keywordMajor>Soul Fragment</keywordMajor> and are revealed for 4/5/6/7/8 seconds.

E.name: Nevermove
E.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits.
E.tooltip: Swain launches a wave of demonic power, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. The wave then returns, detonating on the first enemy hit dealing <magicDamage>? damage</magicDamage> and <status>Rooting</status> enemies in an area for 1.5 seconds.

R.name: Demonic Ascension
R.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to decimate nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire, dealing damage equal to a portion of the health he drained and ending his transformation.
R.tooltip:
Swain frees the demon within for ? seconds, gaining ? max Health and doubling the Health collected with Soul Fragments. Swain deals ? magic damage each second and restores ? Health per target damaged, reduced to ? against non-champions. Swain then prepares a Recast.

Recast: Swain unleashes a demonflare, ending the transformation and dealing ? plus ?% of healing from this Ability as magic damage (max ? damage).

P.name: Headshot
P.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.
P.tooltip: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

Q.name: Piltover Peacemaker
Q.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
Q.tooltip:
Caitlyn revs her rifle to fire a piercing shot dealing ? physical damage. After the bolt strikes the first target, it opens into a wider shot that deals ? physical damage.

Enemies revealed by Yordle Snap Trap always take full damage.

W.name: Yordle Snap Trap
W.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds, granting Caitlyn an empowered Headshot.
W.tooltip: Caitlyn sets a trap that <status>Roots</status> the first champion that steps on it for 1.5 seconds and granting <keywordStealth>True Sight</keywordStealth> of them for 3 seconds. Traps last for 30/35/40/45/50 seconds, and 3/3/4/4/5 traps may be active at once. This Ability has 3/3/4/4/5 charges (? second refresh).

E.name: 90 Caliber Net
E.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
E.tooltip: Caitlyn fires a net, pushing her backwards. The net <status>Slows</status> the first target hit by 50% for 1 seconds and deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

R.name: Ace in the Hole
R.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
R.tooltip: Caitlyn takes a moment to channel and line up the perfect shot, then she fires, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>, but other enemy champions can intercept it. This Ability grants <keywordStealth>True Sight</keywordStealth> of the target during the channel.

P.name: Mana Barrier
P.description: Blitzcrank gains a shield based on his mana when dropping to low health.
P.tooltip: Blitzcrank gains a shield based on his mana when dropping to low health.

Q.name: Rocket Grab
Q.description: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
Q.tooltip: Blitzcrank fires his right hand, <status>Pulling</status> the first enemy hit towards him and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

W.name: Overdrive
W.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
W.tooltip: Blitzcrank supercharges himself, gaining <speed>?% decaying Move Speed</speed> and <attackSpeed>30/38/46/54/62% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for 5 seconds. Afterwards, Blitzcrank is <status>Slowed</status> by 30% for 1.5 seconds.

E.name: Power Fist
E.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
E.tooltip:
Blitzcrank charges up his fist, causing his next Attack to Knock Up and deal ? physical damage.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

R.name: Static Field
R.description: Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly.
R.tooltip:
Passive: While this ability is available, lightning charges Blitzcrank's fists, marking those he Attacks. After 1 second, they are shocked for ? magic damage.

Active: Blitzcrank overcharges, dealing ? magic damage and Silencing nearby enemies for 0.75 seconds. Their shields are also destroyed.

P.name: Granite Shield
P.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.
P.tooltip: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.

Q.name: Seismic Shard
Q.description: Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Move Speed for 3 seconds.
Q.tooltip: Malphite launches a shard of earth at an enemy, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> them by 20/25/30/35/40% for ? seconds. Malphite also steals the amount <status>Slowed</status>, gaining it as <speed>Move Speed</speed> for ? seconds.

W.name: Thunderclap
W.description: Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite gains ? Armor (?% %i:scaleArmor%). This effect is increased to ? (?% %i:scaleArmor%) while Granite Shield is active.

Active: Malphite's next Attack deals an additional ? physical damage and creates an aftershock which deals ? physical damage in their direction. His Attacks continue to create aftershocks for the next ? seconds.

E.name: Ground Slam
E.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
E.tooltip: Malphite slams the ground, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and reducing <attackSpeed>Attack Speed by ?%</attackSpeed> for ? seconds.

R.name: Unstoppable Force
R.description: Malphite launches himself to a location at high speed, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
R.tooltip: Malphite charges with the force of a landslide, dashing Unstoppably. At the end of the dash, Malphite <status>Knocks Up</status> for ? seconds and deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

P.name: Voracity
P.description:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged recently, her remaining ability cooldowns are dramatically reduced.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.
P.tooltip:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged recently, her remaining ability cooldowns are dramatically reduced.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

Q.name: Bouncing Blade
Q.description: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
Q.tooltip: Katarina throws a <keywordMajor>Dagger</keywordMajor>, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to the target and 2 nearby enemies. The <keywordMajor>Dagger</keywordMajor> then ricochets onto the ground behind the primary target.

W.name: Preparation
W.description: Katarina gains a burst of Move Speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.
W.tooltip: Katarina tosses a <keywordMajor>Dagger</keywordMajor> into the air and gains <speed>50/60/70/80/90% Move Speed</speed> decaying over 1.25 seconds.

E.name: Shunpo
E.description: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
E.tooltip:
Katarina dashes in the blink of an eye to the target ally, enemy, or Dagger. If it is an enemy, Katarina strikes for ? magic damage - otherwise she strikes the nearest enemy in range.

Picking up a Dagger will reduce this Ability's Cooldown by ? seconds ({{ f3*100 }}%).

Katarina can blink to any location near the target.

R.name: Death Lotus
R.description: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
R.tooltip:
Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, rapidly attacking the three nearest enemy champions with a flurry of knives. Each knife deals ? magic damage and ? physical damage, and applies ?% Grievous Wound for ? seconds.

Total over ? seconds to each enemy: ? magic damage and ? physical damage.

P.name: Umbra Blades
P.description:
Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown.
P.tooltip:
Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown.

Q.name: Duskbringer
Q.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.
Q.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade, dealing ? physical damage and leaving a dusk trail for 5 seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne is Ghosted and gains 15/20/25/30/35% Move Speed and 20/30/40/50/60 Attack Damage.

W.name: Shroud of Darkness
W.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains 60/70/80/90/100% Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a shadow barrier for 1.5 seconds that blocks the next enemy Ability. If an Ability is blocked, this Ability's passive effect is increased to 60/70/80/90/100% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

E.name: Unspeakable Horror
E.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
E.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains ?% Move Speed toward Feared enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare tether into his target, dealing ? magic damage over 2 seconds. If the tether remains unbroken, the target is Feared for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25 second(s).

R.name: Paranoia
R.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
R.tooltip: Nocturne darkens the map, reducing the sight radius and removing ally vision of enemy champions for ? seconds. Nocturne can <recast>Recast</recast> this Ability during the duration to launch himself at an enemy champion dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>.

P.name: Sap Magic
P.description: Maokai's basic attack also heals him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.
P.tooltip: Maokai's basic attack also heals him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

Q.name: Bramble Smash
Q.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
Q.tooltip: Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies briefly. Nearby enemies are <status>Knocked Back</status>.

W.name: Twisted Advance
W.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
W.tooltip: Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming Untargetable and dashing to an enemy. Upon arrival, he <status>Roots</status> the target for 1/1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4 second(s) and deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

E.name: Sapling Toss
E.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
E.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for ? seconds. Saplings will chase nearby enemies, detonating on proximity, dealing 20/45/70/95/120 plus ? max Health magic damage and Slowing surrounding enemies by 35% for 2 seconds.

If placed in a brush, Saplings last for ? seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing ? plus ? max Health magic damage over 2 seconds.

R.name: Nature's Grasp
R.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
R.tooltip: Maokai summons a colossal wave of brambles and thorns, <status>Rooting</status> enemies for between ? and ? seconds, increasing with distance travelled, and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

P.name: Reign of Anger
P.description: Renekton's attacks generate Fury, increased when he is low on life. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects.
P.tooltip: Renekton's attacks generate Fury, increased when he is low on life. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects.

Q.name: Cull the Meek
Q.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
Q.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing ? physical damage and restoring ? Health per non-champion and ? per champion hit (max 50/75/100/125/150 Health). He also generates 2.5 Fury per non-champion and 10 Fury per champion (max 30 Fury).

Fury Bonus: Damage is increased to ? physical damage and healing is increased to ? Health against non-champions and ? Health against champions (max 200/300/400/500/600 Health). Does not generate any Fury.

W.name: Ruthless Predator
W.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, destroying damage shields on the target, dealing high physical damage, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.
W.tooltip:
Renekton's next Attack strikes twice, Stunning for 0.75 seconds and dealing a total of ? physical damage. Hitting a champion generates an additonal 10 Fury.

Fury Bonus: Renekton Attacks 3 times instead, destroying Shields before dealing ? physical damage and Stunning for 1.5 seconds. Does not generate additional Fury.

E.name: Slice and Dice
E.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
E.tooltip:
Renekton dashes, dealing ? physical damage. He generates 2 Fury per non-champion and 10 Fury per champion hit. Hitting at least one enemy allows Renekton to Recast this Ability once for 4 seconds.

Fury Bonus: The Recast dash deals ? physical damage instead and removes 25/27.5/30/32.5/35% Armor for 4 seconds. Does not generate Fury.

R.name: Dominus
R.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
R.tooltip: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for ? seconds, gaining <healing>? max Health</healing> and <keywordMajor>? Fury</keywordMajor>. While active, he deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and gains <keywordMajor>? Fury</keywordMajor> per second.

P.name: Martial Cadence
P.description: Jarvan's first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage based on their current Health. This effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few seconds.
P.tooltip: Jarvan's first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage based on their current Health. This effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few seconds.

Q.name: Dragon Strike
Q.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
Q.tooltip:
Jarvan extends his lance, dealing ? physical damage and removing 10/14/18/22/26% Armor for 3 seconds.

If the lance connects with Demacian Standard, Jarvan will pull himself to it, Knocking Up those in his path for 0.75 seconds.

W.name: Golden Aegis
W.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
W.tooltip: Jarvan summons an aegis, <status>Slowing</status> nearby enemies by 15/20/25/30/35% for 2 seconds and granting him <shield>? Shield</shield> for each enemy champion hit.

E.name: Demacian Standard
E.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
E.tooltip:
Passive: Jarvan gains ?% Attack Speed.

Active: Jarvan throws a standard into the ground, dealing ? magic damage and granting allies near the standard 20/22.5/25/27.5/30% Attack Speed for 8 seconds.

R.name: Cataclysm
R.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
R.tooltip:
Jarvan heroically leaps to an enemy Champion, dealing ? physical damage to them and surrounding enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for ? seconds.

Jarvan can Recast to collapse the terrain.

P.name: Spider Queen
P.description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
P.tooltip:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

Q.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
Q.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
Q.tooltip: <keywordMajor>Human Form</keywordMajor>: Elise injects neurotoxin, dealing <magicDamage>40/70/100/130/160 plus ? current Health magic damage</magicDamage>.

W.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
W.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
W.tooltip: <keywordMajor>Human Form</keywordMajor>: Elise summons an explosive spider that moves to a location and explodes when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds. The spider deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

E.name: Cocoon / Rappel
E.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.
E.tooltip: <keywordMajor>Human Form</keywordMajor>: Elise fires a cocoon, <status>Stunning</status> and revealing the first enemy hit for 1.6/1.7/1.8/1.9/2 seconds.

R.name: Spider Form
R.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
R.tooltip: <keywordMajor>Human Form</keywordMajor>: Elise transforms into a menacing spider, becoming melee ranged, and gaining <speed>25 Move Speed</speed> and access to <keywordMajor>Spider Form</keywordMajor> Abilities. She also summons all dormant <keywordMajor>Spiderlings</keywordMajor>.

P.name: Clockwork Windup
P.description: Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.
P.tooltip: Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.

Q.name: Command: Attack

P.tooltip: Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

P.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.
P.tooltip: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

Q.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

If the target is Ablaze, they will be Stunned for 1.5 seconds.

Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing ? magic damage to surrounding units.

Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that can bounce to Brand or another enemy up to 5 times, dealing ? magic damage to enemies each bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on champions.

If the target is Ablaze, they are briefly Slowed by ?%.

P.name: Flurry
P.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.
P.tooltip: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

Q.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
Q.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.
Q.tooltip:
Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound, dealing ? physical damage to the first enemy hit, granting True Sight of them, and allows Lee Sin to Recast for the next 3 seconds.

Recast: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by the sound wave, dealing between ? to ? physical damage scaling with the target's missing Health.

W.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
W.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
W.tooltip:
Lee Sin dashes to an ally or ward. If the target is a champion, Lee Sin grants them and himself ? Shield for 2 seconds and reduces this Ability's Cooldown by 50%. Lee Sin may Recast for the next 3 seconds.

Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
R.tooltip:
Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick Knocking Back an enemy champion and dealing ? physical damage.

Enemies the target collides with are briefly Knocked Up and take ? plus ?% of the kicked enemy's bonus Health as physical damage.

P.name: Night Hunter

P.tooltip: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining <speed>30 Move Speed</speed> when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

R.tooltip: Vayne gains <physicalDamage>? Attack Damage</physicalDamage> for ? seconds, extended by ? seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within ? seconds. Additionally, during the duration:<li><spellName>Night Hunter</spellName> instead grants <speed>? Move Speed</speed>.<li>The Cooldown of <spellName>Tumble</spellName> is reduced by ?%, and grants <keywordStealth>Invisibility</keywordStealth> for ? second.

P.tooltip: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. P.tooltip:

P.tooltip: Gragas periodically heals upon using a skill.

W.name: Drunken Rage
W.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
W.tooltip: Gragas guzzles his brew, reducing incoming damage by ? for 2.5 seconds. After finishing his drink, his next Attack deals an additional <magicDamage>?</magicDamage> plus <magicDamage>7% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> to the target and surrounding enemies.

E.name: Body Slam
E.description: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
E.tooltip:
Gragas charges forward, colliding with the first enemy, Knocking Up nearby enemies for 1 second and dealing ? magic damage to them.

This Ability's Cooldown is reduced by ? seconds if Gragas collides with an enemy.

R.name: Explosive Cask
R.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
R.tooltip: Gragas hurls his cask, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Knocking Away</status> enemies from the impact zone.

P.name: Mortal Will
P.description: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.
P.tooltip: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.

Q.name: Comet Spear
Q.description: Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.
Q.tooltip:
Tap: Pantheon thrusts his spear, dealing ? physical damage to enemies hit. Refunds ?% of this Ability's Cooldown.

Hold: Pantheon hurls his spear, dealing ? physical damage to the first enemy hit and ?% less to further targets.

This Ability critically strikes enemies below ?% health for ? physical damage instead.

Mortal Will Bonus: Deals an additional ? physical damage.

W.name: Shield Vault
W.description: Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.
W.tooltip:
Pantheon leaps on his target, Stunning for ? second and dealing ? physical damage.

Mortal Will Bonus: Pantheon's next Attack strikes ? times, dealing a total of ? physical damage.

E.name: Aegis Assault
E.description: Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.
E.tooltip:
Pantheon braces his shield and engages enemies in a chosen direction for ? seconds, becoming immune to non-tower damage from that direction and dealing ? physical damage over the duration. After channeling Pantheon slams with his shield, dealing ? physical damage.

Mortal Will Bonus: When Pantheon slams his shield he gains ?% Move Speed for ? seconds.

R.name: Grand Starfall
R.description: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.
R.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon gains ?% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pantheon gathers his strength to leap high into the air. He throws his spear from above which in a small area deals ? physical damage and Slows by ?% for ? seconds.

Pantheon then crashes down as a meteor at the target area. Deals up to ? magic damage to enemies in a line (decreased by up to ?% at the edges of the area).

This Ability instantly readies Mortal Will.

P.name: Rising Spell Force
P.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.
P.tooltip: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

Q.name: Mystic Shot
Q.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.
Q.tooltip: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit and reducing his Ability Cooldowns by ? seconds.

W.name: Essence Flux
W.description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.
W.tooltip: Ezreal fires a magical orb that sticks to the first champion, structure, or epic jungle monster hit for ? seconds. If Ezreal hits that target with an Attack or Ability, it detonates, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. Detonating with an Ability refunds the Mana cost of that Ability plus <scaleMana>? Mana</scaleMana>.

E.name: Arcane Shift
E.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.
E.tooltip: Ezreal teleports then fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. The bolt prioritizes enemies affected by <spellName>Essence Flux</spellName>.

R.name: Trueshot Barrage
R.description: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).
R.tooltip: Ezreal fires a massive energy arc that deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. The arc deals ?% damage to minions and non-epic jungle monsters.

P.name: Darkness Rise
P.description: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.
P.tooltip: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.

Q.name: Obliterate
Q.description: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.
Q.tooltip: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with Nightfall dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>, increased to <magicDamage>?</magicDamage> if it hits only a single enemy.

W.name: Indestructible
W.description: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Mordekaiser stores ?% of the damage he deals and ?% of the damage he takes.

Active: Mordekaiser gains the stored damage as Shield. He may Recast this Ability to restore ?% of the remaining Shield as Health.

Minimum Shield: ?
Maximum Shield: ?

E.name: Death's Grasp
E.description: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.
E.tooltip:
Passive: Mordekaiser gains ?% Magic Penetration.

Active: Mordekaiser pulls enemies in his direction, dealing ? magic damage.

R.name: Realm of Death
R.description: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.
R.tooltip:
Mordekaiser banishes a champion to the Death Realm with him for ?s, stealing ?% of their core stats for the duration.

If Mordekaiser kills that enemy in the Death Realm he consumes their soul, keeping the stats he stole until the target respawns.

P.name: Shepherd of Souls
P.description: <font color='#FF9900'>The Cursed Horde:</font> Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.
P.tooltip: <font color='#FF9900'>The Cursed Horde:</font> Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.

Q.name: Last Rites
Q.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
Q.tooltip:
Yorick's next Attack deals an additional ? physical damage and restores ? Health, or ? Health if Yorick is below 50% Health. If this Attack kills the target, it leaves a grave.

When there are 3 or more graves nearby and this Ability has already been used, Yorick can Recast to raise Mist Walkers from all nearby graves.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

W.name: Dark Procession
W.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
W.tooltip: Yorick summons a wall of spirits blocking enemies' path, but not allies'. The wall can be Attacked, and disappears after 2/2/3/3/4 hits.

E.name: Mourning Mist
E.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
E.tooltip:
Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that deals 15% current Health magic damage (min: ?), Slows by 30% for 2 seconds, and marks champions and monsters for 4 seconds. Marked enemies continuously Awaken nearby graves (but not exceeding the maximum of ?), and take ?% increased damage from up to ? attacks by Mist Walkers.

Yorick and his summoned units gain 20% Move Speed toward the mark. Mist Walkers will leap once at marked enemies that get away from them.

R.name: Eulogy of the Isles
R.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
R.tooltip:
Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist and ? Mist Walkers. The Maiden has ? Health, deals ? magic damage, and raises Mist Walkers from nearby enemy deaths.

When Yorick damages the Maiden's target, he will deal ?% max Health magic damage. This effect has a ? second Cooldown.

After 10 seconds, Yorick can Recast this Ability to free the Maiden, sending her down the nearest lane.

P.name: Assassin's Mark
P.description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next autoattack with bonus range and damage.
P.tooltip: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next autoattack with bonus range and damage.

Q.name: Five Point Strike
Q.description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.
Q.tooltip: Akali slings kunai in an arc, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies at the tip by ?% for ? seconds.

W.name: Twilight Shroud
W.description: Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Move Speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.
W.tooltip:
Akali drops a smoke bomb, unleashing a spreading cover of smoke lasting ? seconds and granting herself 30/35/40/45/50% Move Speed decaying over ? seconds.

Akali increases her energy by ? while the shroud is active.

While inside the smoke, Akali is Invisible.

E.name: Shuriken Flip
E.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.
E.tooltip: Akali flips backwards as she throws a shuriken, dealing <magicDamage>{{ e1damage }} magic damage</magicDamage> and marking the first enemy or smoke cloud hit. Akali can <recast>Recast</recast> this once to dash to the marked target, dealing <magicDamage>{{ e2damagecalc }} magic damage</magicDamage>.

R.name: Perfect Execution
R.description: Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.
R.tooltip:
Akali vaults over an enemy champion, dealing {{ cast1damage }} magic damage to all enemies in her path.

Akali can Recast after ? seconds to execute a piercing thrust, dashing and dealing {{ cast2damagemin }} to {{ cast2damagemax }} magic damage based on missing health.

P.name: Mark of the Storm
P.description: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.
P.tooltip: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.

Q.name: Thundering Shuriken
Q.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
Q.tooltip: Kennen throws a shuriken, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to the first enemy hit.

W.name: Electrical Surge
W.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Every 5th Attack deals an additional ? magic damage.

Active: Kennen sends out a blast of electricity, dealing ? magic damage to nearby enemies affected by Mark of the Storm.

E.name: Lightning Rush
E.description: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains Move Speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.
E.tooltip:
Kennen turns into a ball of lightning, gaining ?% Move Speed, dealing ? magic damage to enemies he passes through, and becoming Ghosted for ? seconds. If Kennen damages at least one enemy, he gains ? Energy.

After this ability ends, Kennen gains ?% Attack Speed for ? seconds. Kennen can Recast to end this Ability early.

R.name: Slicing Maelstrom
R.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
R.tooltip: Kennen unleashes a magical storm, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to all nearby enemies every ? seconds, and gaining <scaleArmor>? Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>? Magic Resist</scaleMR> for ? seconds. Successive hits deal ?% increased damage for each hit the enemy has already suffered.

P.name: Perseverance
P.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.
P.tooltip: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second.

Q.name: Decisive Strike
Q.description: Garen gains a burst of Move Speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
Q.tooltip:
Garen removes all Slowing effects on him and gains ?% Move Speed for ? second(s).

His next Attack Silences for ? seconds and does ? physical damage.

W.name: Courage
W.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Killing units permanently grants ? Armor and ? Magic Resist, up to a max of ?. At max stacks, Garen gains ? Armor and ? Magic Resist.

Active: Garen steels his courage for ? seconds, reducing incoming damage by ?%. He also gains ? Shield and ?% Tenacity for ? seconds.

E.name: Judgment
E.description: Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.
E.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword for ? seconds, dealing ? physical damage ? times over the duration. The nearest enemy takes ? physical damage per strike instead.

Champions hit by ? strikes lose ?% Armor for ? seconds.

R.name: Demacian Justice
R.description: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion.
R.tooltip: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to slay his enemy, dealing <trueDamage>? plus ?% missing Health true damage</trueDamage>.

P.name: Sunlight
P.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.
P.tooltip: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

Q.name: Shield of Daybreak
Q.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
Q.tooltip: Leona's next Attack <status>Stuns</status> for 1 seconds and deals an additional <magicDamage>?</magicDamage> magic damage.

W.name: Eclipse
W.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Damage Reduction, Armor, and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
W.tooltip: Leona raises her shield, reducing incoming damage by ? and gaining ? Armor and ? Magic Resist for 3 seconds. Afterwards, her shield detonates, dealing ? magic damage to nearby enemies. If she hits at least one, she retains the Armor and Magic Resist bonuses for an additional 3 seconds.

E.name: Zenith Blade
E.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
E.tooltip: Leona thrusts with a sword of light, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. The last champion struck will be <status>Rooted</status> for 0.5 seconds and Leona will dash to them.

R.name: Solar Flare
R.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed.
R.tooltip: Leona calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by ?% for ? seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are <status>Stunned</status> instead of <status>Slowed</status>.

P.name: Void Shift
P.description: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.
P.tooltip: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.

Q.name: Call of the Void
Q.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
Q.tooltip: Malzahar opens two portals to the Void that fire projectiles inward, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Silencing</status> for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 second(s).

W.name: Void Swarm
W.description: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Malzahar's other Abilities give him a stack when cast (max ?).

Active: Malzahar summons a Voidling plus an additional Voidling per stack. Voidlings last ? seconds and deal an additional ? magic damage each hit.

E.name: Malefic Visions
E.description:
Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.

If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
E.tooltip:
Malzahar inflicts terrible visions, dealing ? magic damage over 4 seconds. Applying Call of the Void or Nether Grasp to the victim during this time refreshes the visions.

If the victim dies, Malzahar gains ? Mana and the visions spread to the nearest enemy.

R.name: Nether Grasp
R.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
R.tooltip: Malzahar <status>Suppresses</status> an enemy champion and deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> over 2.5 seconds. A zone of negative energy is created around his target dealing <magicDamage>? max Health magic damage</magicDamage> over 5 seconds.

P.name: Blade's End
P.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and large monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.
P.tooltip: Talon's spells Wound champions and large monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

Q.name: Noxian Diplomacy
Q.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
Q.tooltip:
Talon leaps to a target and deals ? physical damage. If used in melee range, this Ability instead critically strikes for ? physical damage.

If this Ability kills the target, Talon restores ? Health and refunds 50% of its Cooldown.

W.name: Rake
W.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
W.tooltip: Talon tosses a volley of blades, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>. The blades then return to him, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by ?% for ? second.

E.name: Assassin's Path
E.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
E.tooltip: Talon vaults over the nearest terrain or structure. Talon cannot dash over the same terrain more than once every 160/135/110/85/60 seconds.

R.name: Shadow Assault
R.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Move Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
R.tooltip:
Talon disperses a ring of blades that deal ? physical damage, gains ?% Move Speed, and becomes Invisible for ? seconds. When the Invisibility ends, the blades return to Talon, dealing ? physical damage again.

If Talon cancels the Invisibility with an Attack or with Noxian Diplomacy, the blades return to the target instead.

P.name: Runic Blade
P.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.
P.tooltip: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.

Q.name: Broken Wings
Q.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
Q.tooltip:
Riven dashes forward, dealing ? physical damage. She can Recast this Ability twice. The first Recast is the same as the original, but the second has a different effect:

Recast: Riven leaps forward and slams, dealing ? physical damage and Knocks Up nearby enemies for 0.75 seconds.

W.name: Ki Burst
W.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
W.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Stunning</status> for 0.75 seconds.

E.name: Valor
E.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
E.tooltip: Riven quickly dashes and gains <shield>? Shield</shield> for 1.5 seconds.

R.name: Blade of the Exile
R.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
R.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy, granting her ? Attack Damage and increased range on damaging Abilities and Attacks for ? seconds. While active, she can Recast.

Recast: Riven fires a wind slash that deals between ? and ? physical damage, based on their missing Health.

P.name: Icathian Surprise
P.description: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.
P.tooltip: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.

Q.name: Caustic Spittle
Q.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
Q.tooltip:
Passive: Kog'Maw gains 15/20/25/30/35% Attack Speed.

Active: Kog'Maw vomits a corrosive projectile that deals ? magic damage to the first enemy hit and shreds 25/27/29/31/33% Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.

W.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
W.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
W.tooltip: Kog'Maw gains 130/150/170/190/210 Attack Range and his Attacks deal an additional <magicDamage>? max Health magic damage</magicDamage> for 8 seconds.

E.name: Void Ooze
E.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
E.tooltip: Kog'Maw spits bile, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and leaving a trail of ooze for 4 seconds. Enemies in the ooze are <status>Slowed</status> by 20/28/36/44/52%.

R.name: Living Artillery
R.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
R.tooltip:
Kog'Maw shoots acid at an area, dealing ? plus ?% per 1% missing Health magic damage and revealing enemies hit for 2 seconds. Enemies below 40% Health instead take ? magic damage.

Subsequent shots within ? seconds cost an additional ? Mana (max: ? Mana).

P.name: Ki Barrier
P.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.
P.tooltip: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

Q.name: Twilight Assault
Q.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
Q.tooltip:
Shen recalls his Spirit Blade. Enemies hit by the pull are Slowed by 15/20/25/30/35% while moving away from Shen for the next 2 seconds.

Additionally, Shen's next 3 Attacks deal an additional ? plus ? max Health magic damage. If Shen hit an enemy champion with the Spirit Blade, the damage is increased to ? plus ? max Health magic damage and he gains 50% Attack Speed for those Attacks.

W.name: Spirit's Refuge
W.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
W.tooltip:
Shen creates a defensive zone at his Spirit Blade for 1.75 seconds. Attacks against allied champions in the zone are blocked.

If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, it will wait for up to 2 seconds.

E.name: Shadow Dash
E.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
E.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage with Twilight Assault or this Ability recovers ? Energy.

Active: Shen dashes, Taunting champions and jungle monsters for ? seconds and dealing ? physical damage.

R.name: Stand United
R.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
R.tooltip: Shen grants an allied champion anywhere on the map between <shield>?</shield> and <shield>? Shield</shield> based on their missing Health for ? seconds (max Shield at 60% missing Health). After channeling for ? seconds, Shen teleports to his ally's location with his <keywordMajor>Spirit Blade</keywordMajor>.

P.name: Illumination
P.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for a few seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
P.tooltip: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for a few seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

Q.name: Light Binding
Q.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
Q.tooltip: Lux fires a ball of light, <status>Rooting</status> the first two enemies for 2 seconds and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to each.

W.name: Prismatic Barrier
W.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
W.tooltip: Lux throws her wand, granting <shield>? Shield</shield> to allies it passes through. Then it returns, granting the same <shield>Shield</shield> on its return.

E.name: Lucent Singularity
E.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
E.tooltip: Lux creates a light zone that <status>Slows</status> by 25/30/35/40/45% and reveals the area. After 5 seconds or on <recast>Recasting</recast> this Ability, it detonates, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> for an additional ? second.

R.name: Final Spark
R.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
R.tooltip: Lux fires a dazzling ray of light, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> to all enemies in a line.

P.name: Mana Surge
P.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.
P.tooltip: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

Q.name: Arcanopulse
Q.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
Q.tooltip:
Begin Charging: Xerath begins charging an arcane beam, Slowing himself gradually up to 50%.

Release: Xerath fires the beam, dealing ? magic damage. The range increases with time charged.

W.name: Eye of Destruction
W.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
W.tooltip: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> them by ?% for ? seconds. Enemies in the center take <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> instead and are <status>Slowed</status> by ?%, decaying over ? seconds.

E.name: Shocking Orb
E.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
E.tooltip: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic, <status>Stunning</status> the first enemy hit for up to 2 seconds based on distance travelled, and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

R.name: Rite of the Arcane
R.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
R.tooltip:
Xerath ascends to his true form and channels for 10 seconds. During this time he may Recast up to 3/4/5 times.

Recast: Xerath launches a magical artillery, dealing ? magic damage.

P.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
P.description: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.
P.tooltip: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

Q.name: Twin Bite
Q.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.
Q.tooltip:
Shyvana's next Attack strikes twice, dealing ? then ? physical damage.

Attacks reduce this Ability's Cooldown by ? seconds.

Dragon Form: The empowered Attacks hit all units in front of Shyvana.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.

W.name: Burnout
W.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Move Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
W.tooltip:
Shyvana summons a flame storm around her, gaining ? decaying Move Speed and dealing ? magic damage per second for ? seconds.

The flame storm also causes Shyvana's Attacks to deal an additional ? magic damage to surrounding enemies and extend this Ability's duration by ? second.

Dragon Form: The size of the flame storm is increased.

E.name: Flame Breath
E.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
E.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals ? magic damage and marks for ? seconds. The fireball stops on the first champion hit.

Shyvana's Attacks against marked targets deal an additional ?% max Health magic damage.

Dragon Form: The fireball explodes once it ends, dealing an additional ? magic damage and scorching the earth, dealing ? magic damage over 4 seconds.

R.name: Dragon's Descent
R.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
R.tooltip:
Passive: Shyvana generates ? Fury every second, and Attacks generate an extra ? Fury.

Active: Shyvana transforms into Dragon Form, gaining ? max Health and flying forward, dealing ? magic damage and Knocking enemies toward her target location.

P.name: Essence Theft
P.description: When Ahri strikes 9 enemies with her abilities, her next ability also heals her for each enemy hit.
P.tooltip: When Ahri strikes 9 enemies with her abilities, her next ability also heals her for each enemy hit.

Q.name: Orb of Deception
Q.description: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.
Q.tooltip: Ahri throws then pulls back her orb, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> on the way out and <trueDamage>? true damage</trueDamage> on the way back.

W.name: Fox-Fire
W.description: Ahri gains a brief burst of Move Speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
W.tooltip: Ahri releases 3 fox-fires that seek nearby enemies and deal <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>, reduced to <magicDamage>? damage</magicDamage> beyond the first. She also gains <speed>?% Move Speed</speed> decaying over ? seconds.

E.name: Charm
E.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
E.tooltip: Ahri blows a kiss that <status>Charms</status> the first enemy hit for ? second(s) and deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

R.name: Spirit Rush
R.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.
R.tooltip:
Ahri nimbly dashes, firing ? essence bolts at nearby enemies, prioritizing champions. These bolts deal ? magic damage each. Spirit Rush can be recast up to 2 more times within ? seconds.

Consuming a champion's Essence with Essence Theft during this period extends the recast window by up to ? seconds and grants an additional recast of Spirit Rush (up to ? stored).

P.name: New Destiny
P.description: Graves' shotgun has some unique properties. He must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attacks fire 4 bullets, which cannot pass through units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back.
P.tooltip: Graves' shotgun has some unique properties. He must reload when he runs out of ammo. Attacks fire 4 bullets, which cannot pass through units. Non-champions struck by multiple bullets are knocked back.

Q.name: End of the Line
Q.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
Q.tooltip: Graves fires a powder round dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>. After 1 second or after colliding with terrain, it detonates, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> along the travel path again and to enemies near the blast.

W.name: Smoke Screen
W.description: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke that reduces sight range. Enemies caught in the initial impact are dealt magic damage and have their Move Speed reduced briefly.
W.tooltip: Graves creates a cloud of black smoke for 4 seconds, <status>Slowing</status> enemies inside by 50% and blocking their vision outside the area. The initial impact deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

E.name: Quickdraw
E.description: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
E.tooltip:
Graves dashes and reloads one Shell into his shotgun. He also gains a stack for 4 seconds (max ? stacks) or two stacks if he dashes towards an enemy champion. Stacks grant him 4/7/10/13/16 Armor. Stacks are refreshed when damaging a non-minion.

Each bullet hit from Graves' Attacks reduces this Ability's Cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

R.name: Collateral Damage
R.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
R.tooltip: Graves fires an explosive cartridge, blasting himself backwards. The cartridge deals <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy champion or reaching the end of its range, the cartridge explodes outward, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>.

P.name: Nimble Fighter
P.description: Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources
P.tooltip: Fizz can move through units and takes a flat amount of reduced damage from all sources

Q.name: Urchin Strike
Q.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
Q.tooltip: Fizz dashes through an enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> plus <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

W.name: Seastone Trident
W.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage and empower his further attacks for a short time.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's Attacks cause his enemies to bleed, dealing ? magic damage over ? seconds.

Active: Fizz's next Attack deals an additional ? magic damage. If this Attack kills its target, Fizz refunds ? Mana and reduces the cooldown of this Ability to ? second. If it does not kill, Fizz's Attacks deal an additional ? magic damage for ? seconds.

E.name: Playful / Trickster
E.description: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
E.tooltip:
Fizz hops onto his trident, becoming Untargetable for 0.75 seconds, after which he deals ? magic damage to nearby enemies and Slows them by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds.

Fizz can Recast this Ability while Untargetable to dash again, which ends the effect early, deals damage in a smaller area, and doesn't Slow.

R.name: Chum the Waters
R.description: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
R.tooltip:
Fizz launches a fish that attaches to the first champion hit. The victim is afflicted with True Sight and Slowed by between 40% to 80% based on how far the fish travelled before attaching.

After ? seconds a shark erupts on the target, Knocking Up the target with the fish for 1 second, Knocking Back everything else, and dealing between ? to ? magic damage based on how far the fish travelled before attaching.

P.name: The Relentless Storm
P.description: Volibear's Attacks and abilities grant Attack Speed, and eventually cause his Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.
P.tooltip: Volibear's Attacks and abilities grant Attack Speed, and eventually cause his Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.

Q.name: Thundering Smash
Q.description: Volibear gains speed towards enemies, <status>Stunning</status> and damaging the first one he Attacks.
Q.tooltip:
Volibear gains ? Move Speed, doubled to ? towards enemy champions for the next ? seconds. While active, Volibear's next Attack deals ? physical damage and Stuns the target for ? second.

Volibear becomes enraged if an enemy Immobilizes him before he Stuns a target, ending the Ability early but refreshing its Cooldown.

W.name: Frenzied Maul
W.description: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them.  Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals Volibear.
W.tooltip:
Volibear mauls an enemy, dealing ? physical damage and marking them for ? seconds.

If this Ability is used on a marked target, its damage is increased to ? and Volibear restores ? plus ? missing Health.

E.name: Sky Splitter
E.description: Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location, dealing damage and Slowing enemies while granting Volibear a Shield if he's inside the blast radius.
E.tooltip:
Volibear summons a thundercloud that fires a lightning bolt, dealing ? plus ?% max Health magic damage and Slowing by ?% for ? seconds.

If Volibear is inside the blast zone, he gains a ? plus ?% max Health Shield for ? seconds.

R.name: Stormbringer
R.description: Volibear leaps to a target location, Slowing and damaging enemies beneath him while gaining bonus Health.  Enemy towers near his landing location become temporarily disabled.
R.tooltip:
Volibear transforms and leaps, gaining ? Health and ? Attack Range for the next ? seconds.

Upon landing, Volibear cracks the earth, Disabling nearby towers for ? seconds and dealing ? physical damage to them. Nearby enemies are Slowed by ?%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies directly underneath Volibear suffer ? physical damage.

P.name: Unseen Predator
P.description:
While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Leaping while at no Ferocity generates Ferocity.

At Max Ferocity, his next ability is empowered. Casting an empowered ability increases Rengar's Move Speed for a few seconds.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, granting bonus attack damage.
P.tooltip:
While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Leaping while at no Ferocity generates Ferocity.

At Max Ferocity, his next ability is empowered. Casting an empowered ability increases Rengar's Move Speed for a few seconds.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, granting bonus attack damage.

Q.name: Savagery
Q.description:
Rengar's next attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.
Q.tooltip:
Rengar's next 2 Attacks gain 40% Attack Speed. The first Attack deals an additional ? physical damage.

Max Ferocity: The first Attack deals ? physical damage and grants Rengar ? Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

W.name: Battle Roar
W.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
W.tooltip:
Rengar roars, dealing ? magic damage to nearby enemies and restoring 50% of the damage taken in the last 1.5 seconds as Health.

Max Ferocity: Deals ? magic damage and additionally cleanses Rengar of crowd control.

E.name: Bola Strike
E.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.
E.tooltip:
Rengar throws a bola, dealing ? physical damage to the first enemy hit and Slowing them by 30/45/60/75/90% for 1.75 seconds.

Max Ferocity: Deals ? physical damage and Roots for 1.75 seconds.

R.name: Thrill of the Hunt
R.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Move Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.
R.tooltip:
Passive: Rengar will also leap attack when Camouflaged.

Active: Rengar gains ?% Move Speed and True Sight of the nearest enemy champion for ? seconds.

After ? seconds, Rengar becomes Camouflaged and can leap without being in Brush. Leaping to the nearest champion deals an additional ? physical damage, shreds ? Armor for ? seconds, and ends this Ability.

P.name: Living Vengeance
P.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.
P.tooltip: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

Q.name: Piercing Arrow
