R.name: Emperor's Divide
R.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
R.tooltip: Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charges forward, <status>Knocking Back</status> enemies and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. The soldiers remain, blocking enemy paths for 5 seconds.

P.name: Bop 'n' Block
P.description: Periodically, when Yuumi attacks a champion, she restores mana and gains a shield that follows her, protecting her and the ally she's attached to.
P.tooltip: Periodically, when Yuumi attacks a champion, she restores mana and gains a shield that follows her, protecting her and the ally she's attached to.

Q.name: Prowling Projectile
Q.description:
Yuumi fires a missile, dealing damage to the first target hit. It deals bonus damage and slows if it takes at least 1 second to get to its target.

While Attached, the missile can be controlled with your cursor.
Q.tooltip:
Yuumi summons an errant missile that deals ? magic damage to the first enemy hit. If the missile travels for ? second before impacting, it deals ? plus ?% current Health magic damage instead and Slows champions by ?% for ? second.

If cast while Attached, Yuumi can control the missile using her mouse.

W.name: You and Me!
W.description: Passively, Yuumi increases her ally's Adaptive Force and her own. Actively, Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Yuumi increases her Attached ally's Adaptive Force by ? + ?%, and grants herself the same amount.

Active: Yuumi dashes to an ally champion and Attaches to them. While Yuumi is Attached, she follows her partner's movement and is Untargetable except from towers.

Immobilizing effects on Yuumi place this Ability on a ? second Cooldown.

E.name: Zoomies
E.description: Heals Yuumi and boosts Move Speed and Attack Speed. If she's attached, she passes it to her ally instead.
E.tooltip: Yuumi restores <healing>? Health</healing> to herself and gains <speed>?% Move Speed</speed> and <attackSpeed>?% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> for ? seconds. If Yuumi is <keywordMajor>Attached</keywordMajor>, this Ability affects her ally instead.

R.name: Final Chapter
R.description: Yuumi channels seven waves of damage, rooting anyone hit by three or more. Yuumi can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling.
R.tooltip:
Yuumi channels for ? seconds, launching ? waves dealing ? magic damage. Champions hit by ? waves are Rooted for ? seconds.

Yuumi can move and cast You and Me! and Zoomies while channeling.

P.name: Daredevil Impulse
P.description: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by <status>Immobilizing</status> effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is <status>Knocked Up</status>, she also keeps them <status>Knocked Up</status> briefly.
P.tooltip: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by <status>Immobilizing</status> effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is <status>Knocked Up</status>, she also keeps them <status>Knocked Up</status> briefly.

Q.name: Flair
Q.description: Samira fires a shot or swings her sword, dealing damage. If cast during Wild Rush, strike all enemies in her path upon completion.
Q.tooltip:
Samira fires a shot, dealing ? physical damage to the first enemy hit.

If this Ability is cast towards an enemy in melee range, Samira will instead slash with her sword, dealing ? physical damage.

W.name: Blade Whirl
W.description: Samira slashes around her, damaging enemies and destroying enemy missiles.
W.tooltip: Samira slashes around her for ? seconds, damaging enemies twice for ? physical damage each and destroying any enemy missiles that enter the area.

E.name: Wild Rush
E.description: Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown.
E.tooltip:
Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through dealing ? magic damage and gaining ?% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

If an enemy champion is killed within 3 seconds of Samira damaging them, Wild Rush's cooldown is reset.

R.name: Inferno Trigger
R.description: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her.
R.tooltip:
Samira can only use this Ability if her current Style rating is S.

Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her 10 times over 2 seconds, each shot dealing ? physical damage and applying lifesteal at ?% effectiveness. Each shot can also critically strike.

P.name: Damnation
P.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
P.tooltip: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

Q.name: Death Sentence
Q.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
Q.tooltip:
Thresh throws out his scythe, Stunning the first unit hit and Pulling them towards Thresh for 1.5 seconds. The scythe does ? magic damage and also grants True Sight for the duration.

Thresh can Recast this Ability to pull himself to the enemy.

If this Ability hits, its Cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

W.name: Dark Passage
W.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
W.tooltip:
Thresh throws his lantern, allowing an ally to click on it to dash to Thresh.

The lantern also grants ? Shield to Thresh and up to one ally champion if they come in contact with it.

E.name: Flay
E.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
E.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh's Attacks deal additional damage based on how long since he last Attacked. They deal between ? and ? magic damage.

Active: Thresh whips his chains, Pulling or Pushing enemies in the direction of the swing. Enemies hit are also Slowed by 20/25/30/35/40% for 1 second and take ? magic damage.

R.name: The Box
R.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
R.tooltip: Thresh creates a prison of spectral walls, <status>Slowing</status> champions by 99% for 2 seconds and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. Walls break after one collision, and after one is broken, the rest deal no damage and <status>Slow</status> for half duration.

P.name: Prophet of an Elder God
P.description: Illaoi and the <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font> she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font>, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.
P.tooltip: Illaoi and the <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font> she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font>, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

Q.name: Tentacle Smash
Q.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
Q.tooltip:
Passive: Slam damage is increased by ?% (currently ? physical damage).

Active: Illaoi swings her idol, causing a Tentacle to Slam forward.

W.name: Harsh Lesson
W.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
W.tooltip: Illaoi's next Attack causes her to leap at the target, dealing an additional <physicalDamage>? max Health physical damage</physicalDamage>. When she strikes, nearby Tentacles will <keywordMajor>Slam</keywordMajor> at the target.

E.name: Test of Spirit
E.description: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a <font color='#669900'>Vessel</font> and begin spawning Tentacles.
E.tooltip:
Illaoi pulls the spirit from an enemy champion for ? seconds. The spirit can be damaged like a champion, with ? of that damage echoing to its owner.

If the spirit dies or the target leaves its range, the target becomes marked for ? seconds and is Slowed by ?% for ? seconds. Marked enemies spawn Tentacles every ? seconds.

Tentacles will automatically Slam at spirits and marked enemies once every ? seconds.

R.name: Leap of Faith
R.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
R.tooltip:
Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing ? physical damage to nearby enemies and spawning a Tentacle for each enemy champion hit.

For the next ? seconds, Tentacles are untargetable and Slam 50% faster, and Harsh Lesson has a 2 second cooldown.

P.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
P.description: Rek'sai generates Fury by Attack and hitting with basic abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.
P.tooltip: Rek'sai generates Fury by Attack and hitting with basic abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.

Q.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
Q.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
Q.tooltip: <keywordMajor>Un-Burrowed</keywordMajor>: Rek'Sai's next 3 Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> to nearby enemies.

W.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
W.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
W.tooltip: <keywordMajor>Un-Burrowed:</keywordMajor> Rek'sai burrows into the ground, gaining access to new Abilities, and <speed>? Move Speed</speed>, but cannot Attack. She has reduced vision range, but nearby enemies that move and are otherwise unseen will have their positions revealed to Rek'sai and her allies.

E.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
E.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
E.tooltip: <scaleAD>Un-Burrowed:</scaleAD> Rek'Sai bites a target, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage>. At max <keywordMajor>Fury</keywordMajor>, the bite deals <trueDamage>? true damage</trueDamage> instead.

R.name: Void Rush
R.description: Rek'sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their missing health.
R.tooltip: Rek'Sai targets an enemy damaged by her in the last ? seconds and then dives underground, becoming untargetable. Moments later, she leaps unstoppably at her target, dealing <physicalDamage>? plus ?% missing Health physical damage</physicalDamage>.

P.name: Friend of the Forest
P.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.
P.tooltip: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

Q.name: Rootcaller
Q.description: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.
Q.tooltip: Ivern conjures a vine dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Rooting</status> the first enemy hit for 1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8/2 seconds. Allies that Attack a <status>Rooted</status> enemy dash into attack range.

W.name: Brushmaker
W.description: In brush, Ivern's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.
W.tooltip:
Passive: While in brush and for 3 seconds after leaving it Ivern's Attacks deal an additional ? magic damage.

Active: Ivern grows a patch of Brush for 30 seconds and reveals it for 3 seconds.

E.name: Triggerseed
E.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.
E.tooltip: Ivern grants <shield>? Shield</shield> to an ally champion. After 2 seconds, it bursts, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> enemies by 50/55/60/65/70% for 2 seconds.

R.name: Daisy!
R.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
R.tooltip:
Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy for ? seconds. If Daisy Attacks the same champion three consecutive times she creates a shockwave, dealing ? magic damage and Knocking Up enemies for 1 second (3s Cooldown).

Daisy has:
? Health
? Armor
? Magic Resist
? Attack Damage

Recast: Manually issue orders to Daisy.

P.name: Martial Poise
P.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
P.tooltip: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

Q.name: Pierce
Q.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
Q.tooltip:
Kalista hurls a spear, dealing ? physical damage to the first target hit. If this kills the target, the spear continues onward, carrying any Rend stacks to the next target hit.

Kalista can dash after using this Ability using Martial Poise.

W.name: Sentinel
W.description:
Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
W.tooltip:
Passive: When Kalista and her Oathsworn both Attack the same target, she deals 14/15/16/17/18% max Health magic damage. This effect has a 10 second Cooldown per target.

Active: Kalista sends a ghost to patrol an area for three laps. Champions spotted are revealed for 4 seconds. This ability has 2 charges (90/80/70/60/50 second refresh).

E.name: Rend
E.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
E.tooltip:
Passive: Kalista's spears linger in their target for 4 seconds, stacking any number of times.

Active: Kalista rips the spears from nearby enemies, dealing ? plus ? physical damage per spear beyond the first. Slows enemies hit by ?% for ? seconds.

If this Ability kills at least one target, its Cooldown is refreshed and it refunds ? Mana.

R.name: Fate's Call
R.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
R.tooltip: Kalista puts her <keywordMajor>Oathsworn</keywordMajor> into Stasis and draws them to herself for up to 4 seconds. The <keywordMajor>Oathsworn</keywordMajor> can click to launch themselves, stopping at the first champion hit and <status>Knocking Back</status> all nearby enemies. If the <keywordMajor>Oathsworn</keywordMajor> hits a champion, they are placed at their maximum attack range from it.

P.name: Traveler's Call
P.description:
Meeps: Bard attracts lesser spirits that assist with his basic attacks to deal extra magic damage. When Bard has collected enough Chimes, his meeps will also deal damage in an area and slow enemies hit.

Chimes: Ancient chimes randomly appear for Bard to collect. These grant experience, restore mana, and provide out of combat Move Speed.
P.tooltip:
Meeps: Bard attracts lesser spirits that assist with his basic attacks to deal extra magic damage. When Bard has collected enough Chimes, his meeps will also deal damage in an area and slow enemies hit.

Chimes: Ancient chimes randomly appear for Bard to collect. These grant experience, restore mana, and provide out of combat Move Speed.

Q.name: Cosmic Binding
Q.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
Q.tooltip:
Bard fires an energy bolt, dealing ? magic damage to the first two enemies hit. The first target hit is Slowed by 60% for 1/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8 second(s).

If the bolt hits a second enemy or a wall, any enemies hit are Stunned for 1/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8 second(s).

W.name: Caretaker's Shrine
W.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing and speeding up the first ally that touches it.
W.tooltip:
Bard creates a health shrine that grants 30% Move Speed decaying over 1.5 seconds and restores at least ? Health to the first ally to enter. The shrine grows to restore ? Health after existing for 10 seconds.

Bard can have up to 3 shrines at once. If an enemy champion enters a shrine, it is destroyed.

Current Active Shrines: ? / ?

E.name: Magical Journey
E.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
E.tooltip: Bard opens a one-way portal through Terrain for 10 seconds. Any champion can enter the portal by moving onto it while near the entrance.

R.name: Tempered Fate
R.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
R.tooltip: Bard hurls magical protective energy to an area, placing all units and structures hit into Stasis for ? seconds.

P.name: Fey Feathers
P.description: Rakan periodically gains a shield.
P.tooltip: Rakan periodically gains a shield.

Q.name: Gleaming Quill
Q.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
Q.tooltip:
Rakan flings a magical feather that deals ? magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the feather hits a champion or epic jungle monster, Rakan restores ? Health to himself and nearby allies after 3 seconds or when he touches an allied champion.

W.name: Grand Entrance
W.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
W.tooltip: Rakan dashes, then spirals into the air, <status>Knocking Up</status> for ? second and dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

E.name: Battle Dance
E.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
E.tooltip:
Rakan dashes to an allied champion, granting them ? Shield for 3 seconds.

Rakan can Recast this Ability once within 5 seconds.

R.name: The Quickness
R.description: Gains Move Speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
R.tooltip: Rakan gains <speed>75% Move Speed</speed> for 4 seconds. Rakan deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Charms</status> enemies for 1/1.25/1.5 second(s) the first time he touches them. The first champion touched grants Rakan <speed>150% decaying Move Speed</speed>.

P.name: Clean Cuts
P.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a <font color='#C200E1'>Feather</font>.
P.tooltip: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a <font color='#C200E1'>Feather</font>.

Q.name: Double Daggers
Q.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
Q.tooltip: Xayah throws two daggers, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> each and leaving two <keywordMajor>Feathers</keywordMajor>. Targets hit after the first take <physicalDamage>? damage</physicalDamage> from each dagger.

W.name: Deadly Plumage
W.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her Attack Speed and damage while also granting her Move Speed if she attacks a champion.
W.tooltip:
Xayah creates a storm of blades for 4 seconds that grants her 35/40/45/50/55% Attack Speed and cause her Attacks to fire a secondary blade that deals 20% damage.

When the secondary blade hits a champion, she grants herself 30% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.

If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of this Ability, except he gains Move Speed when Xayah strikes a target.

E.name: Bladecaller
E.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
E.tooltip: Xayah calls all <keywordMajor>Feathers</keywordMajor> back to her, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> each, increased by ?. If ? or more <keywordMajor>Feathers</keywordMajor> hit an enemy, they are <status>Rooted</status> for ? seconds.

R.name: Featherstorm
R.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
R.tooltip: Xayah leaps into the air becoming Untargetable and Ghosted for 1.5 seconds before raining down daggers that deal <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and leave behind a line of <keywordMajor>Feathers</keywordMajor>.

P.name: Living Forge
P.description:
Ornn gains an additional bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, he can create masterwork items for himself and for his allies.
P.tooltip:
Ornn gains an additional bonus Armor and Magic Resistance from all sources.

Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, he can create masterwork items for himself and for his allies.

Q.name: Volcanic Rupture
Q.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.
Q.tooltip: Ornn slams the ground, creating a fissure dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by 40% for 2 seconds. A pillar of rock forms at the fissure's end for 4 seconds.

W.name: Bellows Breath
W.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
W.tooltip:
Ornn stomps forward Unstoppably while breathing fire, dealing ?% max Health magic damage over ? seconds. Enemies hit by the final bout of flame become Brittle for ? seconds.

Immobilizing effects on Brittle targets have their duration increased by 30% and deal an additional ? max Health magic damage. Ornn's Attacks against Brittle targets Knock them Back, dealing the additional damage.

E.name: Searing Charge
E.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
E.tooltip:
Ornn charges, dealing ? physical damage. If Ornn rams into terrain, he creates a shockwave that Knocks Up enemies for ? seconds and applies the same damage to those not hit by the charge.

Ornn's charge destroys magma pillars and terrain created by enemies.

R.name: Call of the Forge God
R.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
R.tooltip:
Ornn summons a massive lava elemental, which stampedes towards him, dealing ? magic damage, and applying Brittle for ? seconds. The elemental also Slows by up to ?% based on distance traveled.

Ornn can Recast to dash with a headbutt. If he dashes into the elemental, he redirects and empowers it, causing it to Knock Up the first champion for ? second and subsequent champions for ? seconds. The elemental also deals ? magic damage and reapplies Brittle.

P.name: Petricite Burst
P.description: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst.  Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.
P.tooltip: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst.  Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.

Q.name: Chain Lash
Q.description:
Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies.

After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.
Q.tooltip: Sylas lashes his chains out, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> by ? for ? seconds. The place where the chains intersect explodes, dealing a further <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>.

W.name: Kingslayer
W.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions.
W.tooltip: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. Against champions, Sylas restores between <healing>?</healing> and <healing>? Health</healing> based on his missing Health (max healing at or below ?% Health).

E.name: Abscond / Abduct
E.description: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.
E.tooltip:
Sylas quickly dashes, and prepares a Recast for 3.5 seconds.

Recast: Sylas throws his chains, pulling himself to the first enemy hit, dealing ? magic damage, and Knocking Up for ? seconds.

R.name: Hijack
R.description: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.
R.tooltip:
Sylas hijacks an enemy champion, allowing him to cast a copy of their ultimate Ability, based on his Ultimate level and using his stats.

Hijacking an enemy places a Cooldown on them for ?% (modified by Sylas' Ability Haste) of the enemy's ultimate's Cooldown, with a minimum of ? seconds, during which time Sylas cannot hijack them again.

P.name: Inherent Glamour
P.description: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Taking damage from enemy Champions or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.
P.tooltip: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Taking damage from enemy Champions or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.

Q.name: Blooming Burst
Q.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.
Q.tooltip: Neeko throws a seed that blooms to deal ? magic damage. If it kills a unit or hits a champion or large monster, it will bloom again, dealing ? magic damage. Max 2 extra blooms.

W.name: Shapesplitter
W.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Every 3rd attack deals ? bonus magic damage and increases Neeko's Move Speed by ?% for ? second.

Active: Neeko becomes invisible for ? seconds and projects a clone that lasts ? seconds. Neeko and the clone gain ?% Move Speed for ? seconds.

E.name: Tangle-Barbs
E.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.
E.tooltip:
Neeko slings a tangle that deals ? magic damage and roots for ? seconds.

The tangle becomes empowered after hitting an enemy, growing larger, moving faster, and rooting for ? seconds.

R.name: Pop Blossom
R.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air and gains a shield. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.
R.tooltip:
After ? seconds Neeko leaps into the air. She gains a shield that absorbs ? damage (+? for each nearby enemy champion).

When Neeko lands she deals ? magic damage and stuns nearby enemies for ? seconds.

This ability can be prepared in secret if Neeko is disguised.

P.name: The Hitman and the Seer
P.description: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.
P.tooltip: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.

Q.name: Weapon Abilites
Q.description:
Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon:

Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack.
Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons.
Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon.
Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon.
Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

W.name: Phase
W.description: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability.
W.tooltip: Swap main-hand and off-hand weapons, equipping Gravitum.

E.name: Weapon Queue System
E.description: Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order.

R.name: Moonlight Vigil
R.description: Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-hand gun.
R.tooltip:
Aphelios fires a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes when it hits a champion, dealing ? physical damage to surrounding enemies.

Then, Aphelios attacks all champions hit with his main-hand weapon. {{ Spell_ApheliosR_WeaponMod_? }}

P.name: Break the Mold
P.description: Rell attacks slowly but steals her target's <scaleArmor>Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR> on hit, dealing bonus damage based on the amount stolen.
P.tooltip: Rell attacks slowly but steals her target's <scaleArmor>Armor</scaleArmor> and <scaleMR>Magic Resist</scaleMR> on hit, dealing bonus damage based on the amount stolen.

Q.name: Shattering Strike
Q.description:
Rell thrusts her lance to deal magic damage to units in a line, breaking their Shields. The first unit hit additionally suffers Break the Mold's defense steal.

If Rell is bound to an ally with Attract and Repel, they both recover health for each enemy champion hit by this spell.
Q.tooltip:
Rell thrusts her lance, destroying all Shield and dealing ? magic damage. The first unit hit takes ? damage instead and suffers Break the Mold's defense steal.

If Rell is bound to an ally with Attract and Repel, they both recover ? plus ?% missing Health for each enemy champion hit.

W.name: Ferromancy: Crash Down
W.description:
Passive: Rell gains additional Move Speed while mounted and additional Armor and Magic Resist while armored.

Active: Rell changes forms, casting a different spell based on form.
  • Mounted: Rell crashes down in her armor, knocking enemies up and gaining a large shield.
  • Armored: Rell forms her mount, gaining a burst of speed and flipping the next enemy she attacks.
W.tooltip:
Passive - Mounted: Rell gains ? Move Speed, reduced when taking damage.

Active - Ferromancy: Crash Down: Rell leaps off her mount, Knocking Up enemies for ? second and dealing ? magic damage. Rell then enters Armored form, gaining ? Shield, reducing her Move Speed, and allowing her to use Ferromancy: Mount Up.

E.name: Attract and Repel
E.description:
Rell binds a piece of her Armor to another allied champion to grant them Armor and Magic Resist while near.

While she has an ally bound in this way, Rell can cast this ability without targeting an allied champion to snap the binding and Stun enemies caught in it.
E.tooltip:
Rell binds a piece of her Armor to another allied champion, granting them ? Armor and ? Magic Resist while near you. Doing this has no cost and puts this Ability on Cooldown for 3 seconds.

If Rell uses this Ability without targeting an allied champion, she snaps the binding, Stunning enemies around and between herself and her bound ally and dealing ? magic damage.

R.name: Magnet Storm
R.description: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently <status>Pulling</status> nearby enemies towards herself. Then Rell constantly <status>Drags</status> nearby enemies towards herself for a short while, dealing <magicDamage>magic damage</magicDamage> over time.
R.tooltip: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently <status>Pulling</status> nearby enemies towards herself. Then Rell constantly <status>Drags</status> nearby enemies towards herself and deals <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> over the next ? seconds.

P.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
P.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.
P.tooltip: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

Q.name: Bone Skewer
Q.description: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.
Q.tooltip:
Tap: Pyke stabs, dealing ? physical damage to the first enemy hit, preferring champions.

Hold: Pyke throws his harpoon, dealing ? physical damage to the first enemy hit and Pulling them towards him. They are then Slowed by 90% for 1 second.

W.name: Ghostwater Dive
W.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.
W.tooltip: Pyke gains <keywordStealth>Camouflage</keywordStealth> and <speed>?% Move Speed</speed> decaying over ? seconds.

E.name: Phantom Undertow
E.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.
E.tooltip: Pyke dashes, leaving a drowned phantom behind him that returns to him shortly. The phantom <status>Stuns</status> for ? seconds and deals <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> to champions.

R.name: Death From Below
R.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.
R.tooltip:
Pyke strikes all enemy champions in an X, teleporting to and executing targets below ? Health. Champions above the threshold and non-champions instead take ? physical damage.

When an enemy champions dies inside the X, they grant the kill gold to both Pyke and an assisting ally and Pyke can Recast this Ability for free within ? seconds.

P.name: Doom 'n Gloom
P.description: Vex periodically becomes empowered, causing her next basic Ability to fear enemies and interrupt dashes. Whenever a nearby enemy dashes, Vex applies a mark that can be consumed for bonus damage that also reduces the cooldown of her empowered state.
P.tooltip: Vex periodically becomes empowered, causing her next basic Ability to fear enemies and interrupt dashes. Whenever a nearby enemy dashes, Vex applies a mark that can be consumed for bonus damage that also reduces the cooldown of her empowered state.

Q.name: Mistral Bolt
Q.description: Launch a damaging missile that accelerates mid-flight.
Q.tooltip:
Vex launches a wave of mist that deals ? magic damage. After a delay, the wave becomes smaller and faster.

Consumes Gloom on enemies hit.

W.name: Personal Space
W.description: Gain a shield and damage nearby enemies.
W.tooltip:
Vex gains ? Shield for ? seconds and emits a shockwave that deals ? magic damage.

Consumes Gloom on enemies hit.

E.name: Looming Darkness
E.description: Summon a damaging and slowing zone that applies Gloom to enemies.
E.tooltip:
Vex commands Shadow to fly to a location, increasing in size as it travels. Upon arriving, it deals ? magic damage and Slows by ?% for ? seconds.

Applies Gloom to enemies hit.

R.name: Shadow Surge
R.description: Fire a missile that marks an enemy champion.  Recast to dash to them and deal damage.
R.tooltip:
Shadow excitedly surges forward, dealing ? magic damage and marking the first enemy champion hit for 4 seconds.

Recast: Dash to the marked champion, dealing ? magic damage on arrival.

If the marked champion dies within ? seconds of taking damage from this Ability, its Cooldown is temporarily reset.

P.name: Way of the Hunter
P.description: Yone deals magic damage with every second Attack. In addition, his critical strike chance is increased.
P.tooltip: Yone deals magic damage with every second Attack. In addition, his critical strike chance is increased.

Q.name: Mortal Steel
Q.description:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes Yone forward with a gust of wind knocking enemies Airborne.

Mortal Steel is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.
Q.tooltip:
Yone thrusts forward, dealing ? physical damage.

On hit, grants a stack for ? seconds. At 2 stacks, this skill causes Yone to dash forward with a wave of wind that Knocks Up for {{ q3knockupduration }} seconds and deals ? physical damage.

W.name: Spirit Cleave
W.description:
Cleaves forward, damaging all enemies in a cone. Grants a shield to Yone, the value is increased by the number of champions hit by the swipe.

Spirit Cleave's cooldown and cast time scale with attack speed.
W.tooltip:
Yone cleaves forward, dealing ? + ?% max Health physical damage and ? + ?% max Health magic damage.

If Yone hits, he gains ? Shield for ? seconds. The amount of Shield increases for each champion struck.

E.name: Soul Unbound
E.description: Yone's spirit leaves his body behind, gaining Move Speed. When this skill ends, Yone's spirit is forced back to his body and he repeats a portion of the damage he dealt as a spirit.
E.tooltip:
Yone enters a spirit form for ? seconds, leaving his body behind for the duration and gaining ?% ramping Move Speed.

When the spirit form ends, Yone snaps back to his body and repeats ?% of all damage he dealt to champions during this time. You may Recast this skill during spirit form.

Recast: End spirit form early.

R.name: Fate Sealed
R.description: Yone blinks behind the last champion in a line with a slash so powerful it pulls all enemies hit towards him.
R.tooltip: Yone strikes all enemies along a path for <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>, teleporting behind the last champion hit and <status>Knocking Up</status> victims towards Yone.

P.name: Pit Grit
P.description: Sett's basic attacks alternate between left and right punch. Right punch is slightly stronger and faster. Sett also hates losing, gaining additional health regeneration based off of his missing health.
P.tooltip: Sett's basic attacks alternate between left and right punch. Right punch is slightly stronger and faster. Sett also hates losing, gaining additional health regeneration based off of his missing health.

Q.name: Knuckle Down
Q.description: Sett's next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. Sett also gains Move Speed while moving towards enemy champions.
Q.tooltip:
Sett itches for a fight, gaining ?% Move Speed towards enemy champions for ? seconds.

Additionally Sett's next two Attacks deal an additional ? plus ? max Health physical damage.

W.name: Haymaker
W.description: Sett passively stores damage he takes as Grit. On cast, Sett expends all stored Grit to gain a shield and punch an area, dealing true damage in the center and physical damage on the sides.
W.tooltip:
Passive: Sett stores ?% of damage taken as Grit, up to ?. Grit decays quickly ? seconds after the damage was taken.

Active: Sett consumes all Grit, gaining a ?% Grit consumed Shield decaying over ? seconds. Sett then delivers a massive punch, dealing ? plus ? Grit consumed true damage to enemies in the center (max ? damage). Enemies not in the center instead take physical damage.

E.name: Facebreaker
E.description: Sett pulls in all enemies on opposite sides of him, dealing damage and stunning them. If enemies were only on one side, they are slowed instead of stunned.
E.tooltip: Sett smashes enemies on either side of him into each other, dealing <physicalDamage>? physical damage</physicalDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> them by ?% for ? seconds. If Sett grabbed at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are <status>Stunned</status> for ? second.

R.name: The Show Stopper
R.description: Sett carries an enemy champion through the air and slams them into the ground, dealing damage and slowing all enemies near where they land.
R.tooltip: Sett grabs an enemy champion and <status>Suppresses</status> them as he carries them forward, then slams them into the ground, dealing <physicalDamage>? plus ?% of the grabbed enemy's bonus Health physical damage</physicalDamage> to surrounding enemies and <status>Slowing</status> them by ?% for ? second. Enemies take less damage the further they are from where Sett lands.

P.name: Dream-Laden Bough
P.description: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.
P.tooltip: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.

Q.name: Blooming Blows
Q.description: Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.
Q.tooltip:
Passive: Lillia's Ability hits grant ? Move Speed for ? seconds, stacking up to ? times.

Active: Lillia whirls her censer, dealing ? magic damage, plus an additional ? true damage at the outer edge.

W.name: Watch Out! Eep!
W.description: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.
W.tooltip: Lillia winds up a huge strike, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage>. Enemies in the center take <magicDamage>? damage</magicDamage> instead.

E.name: Swirlseed
E.description: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target.
E.tooltip: Lillia lobs a swirlseed overhead, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> where it lands and revealing and <status>Slowing</status> them by ?% for ? seconds. If no enemies are hit, the seed rolls until it hits an enemy or collides with terrain.

R.name: Lilting Lullaby
R.description: Lillia causes all enemies with Dream Dust on them to become Drowsy before falling asleep. Those enemies will take extra damage on being forcibly woken up.
R.tooltip:
Lillia causes all enemy champions with Dream Dust to become Drowsy for ? seconds. Afterward, they fall Asleep for ? seconds.

When awakened by damage, they take an additional ? magic damage.

P.name: A Thousand Cuts
P.description: Gwen's attacks deal bonus magic damage based on the targets health. She heals for a portion of the damage dealt to champions by this effect.
P.tooltip: Gwen's attacks deal bonus magic damage based on the targets health. She heals for a portion of the damage dealt to champions by this effect.

Q.name: Snip Snip!
Q.description: Gwen snips her scissors in a cone up to 6 times dealing magic damage. Gwen deals true damage to units in the center and applies her passive to them on each snip.
Q.tooltip:
Passive: Gwen gains 1 stack when she hits an enemy with an attack (max 4, lasts ? seconds).

Active: Consumes stacks. Gwen snips once for ? magic damage, snips again for each ammo consumed, and then snips a final time for ? magic damage.

The center of each strikes deals true damage instead and applies A Thousand Cuts to enemies hit.

W.name: Hallowed Mist
W.description: Gwen summons mist that protects her from enemies outside of it. She can only be targeted by enemies who enter the mist.
W.tooltip:
Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist, making her Untargetable to all enemies (except towers) outside the zone for ? seconds or until she leaves it. While in the Mist, Gwen gains ? Armor and Magic Resist.

Gwen can Recast this Ability once to call the Mist to her. This will automatically Recast the first time Gwen attempts to leave the zone.

E.name: Skip 'n Slash
E.description: Gwen dashes a short distance then gains Attack Speed, attack range, and magic damage <OnHit>On-Hit</OnHit> for a few seconds. If she hits an enemy during that time, this Ability's cooldown is partially refunded.
E.tooltip:
Gwen dashes and empowers her Attacks for ? seconds.

Empowered Attacks gain ? Attack Speed, ? magic damage %i:OnHit% On-Hit, ? range, and the first one to hit an enemy refunds ?% of this Ability's Cooldown.

R.name: Needlework
R.description:
Gwen hurls a needle that slows enemies hit, deals magic damage, and applies A Thousand Cuts to champions hit.

This ability can be cast up to two more times, with each cast throwing additional needles and dealing more damage. Gwen must hit an enemy between each cast to unlock the next one.
R.tooltip:
First Cast: Hurl a needle that deals ? magic damage, Slows by ?% for ? seconds, and applies A Thousand Cuts to all enemies hit. If Gwen hits an enemy with an Attack or Ability within 6 second of casting this, she can Recast it (up to 2 additional times).

Second Cast: Fire three needles to deal ? magic damage
Third Cast: Fire five needles to deal ? magic damage

P.name: Leverage
P.description: Renata's Attacks deal bonus damage and mark enemies. Renata's allies can damage marked enemies to deal bonus damage.
P.tooltip: Renata's Attacks deal bonus damage and mark enemies. Renata's allies can damage marked enemies to deal bonus damage.

Q.name: Handshake
Q.description: Renata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction.
Q.tooltip:
Renata sends out a missile from her arm, Rooting the first enemy hit for ? second and dealing ? magic damage.

Recast: Renata Pulls the enemy in a direction, dealing ? magic damage to enemies they are thrown into and Stunning for ? seconds if the thrown enemy is a champion.

W.name: Bailout
W.description: Renata buffs an allied champion to fight harder, delaying their death and potentially saving them if they get a takedown.
W.tooltip:
Renata infuses an ally champion, granting ? Attack Speed and ? Move Speed towards enemies, increasing to ? Attack Speed and ? Move Speed over ? seconds. Takedowns refresh the duration of the buff.

If the ally would die, they instead return to full Health, which then decays over 3 seconds.

If they get a Takedown while decaying, they will be set to ?% max Health and stop decaying.

The Champion's death can be delayed by healing or similar effects while in the decaying state, but cannot be prevented unless the Champion gets a Takedown. Champions can only delay their death once.

E.name: Loyalty Program
E.description: Renata sends out a pair of chemtech missiles, shielding allies and damaging and slowing enemies hit.
E.tooltip: Renata sends out a pair of chemtech missiles, dealing <magicDamage>? magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Slowing</status> surrounding enemies and enemies hit by 30% for ? seconds. Allies hit gain <shield>? Shield</shield> for ? seconds.

R.name: Hostile Takeover
R.description: Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, causing any enemies hit to go Berserk.
R.tooltip:
Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, Berserking enemies for ? seconds, causing them to Attack the nearest unit, prioritizing their allies.

While Berserk, enemies gain ?% Attack Speed.

8005.name: Press the Attack
8005.short_desc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.
8005.long_desc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 180 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 8 - 12% from all sources for 6s.

8008.name: Lethal Tempo
8008.short_desc: 1.5s after damaging a champion gain a large amount of Attack Speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
8008.long_desc:
1.5s after damaging a champion gain 40 - 110% Attack Speed (based on level) for 3s. Attacking a champion extends the effect to 6s.

Cooldown: 6s

Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

8009.name: Presence of Mind
8009.short_desc: Increase your mana or energy regeneration when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.
8009.long_desc:
Damaging an enemy champion increases your mana regeneration by @RegenAmount@ (80% for ranged) mana per second for 4 seconds. All energy users gain 1.5 energy per second, instead.

Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.

8010.name: Conqueror
8010.short_desc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
8010.long_desc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

8014.name: Coup de Grace
8014.short_desc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.
8014.long_desc: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.

8017.name: Cut Down
8017.short_desc: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.
8017.long_desc:
Deal 5% to 15% more damage to champions, based on how much more max health they have than you.

Bonus damage scales up linearly against enemies with 10% to 100% more max health than you.

8021.name: Fleet Footwork
8021.short_desc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
8021.long_desc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.2 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.

8105.name: Relentless Hunter
8105.long_desc:
Gain 5 Move Speed out of combat plus 8 per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

8106.name: Ultimate Hunter
8106.short_desc: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.
8106.long_desc:
Your ultimate gains 6 Ability Haste, plus an additional 5 Ability Haste per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

8112.name: Electrocute
8112.short_desc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
8112.long_desc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 30 - 180 (+0.4 bonus AD, +0.25 AP) damage.

Cooldown: 25 - 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

8120.name: Ghost Poro
8120.short_desc: When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro. The Ghost Poro grants vision until discovered. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Ghost Poro and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion, plus bonus upon completion.
8120.long_desc:
When your wards expire, they leave behind a Ghost Poro, which grants vision for 90s. Nearby enemy champions scare the Ghost Poro away.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Ghost Poro spawned and when your Ghost Poro spots an enemy champion up to 10 stacks.

After gaining 10 stacks, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

8124.name: Predator
8124.short_desc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
8124.long_desc:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Gain increased Movement Speed, ramping up to 45% Movement Speed over 1.5 seconds, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 40-120 (+0.2 bonus AD)(+0.1 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 90s-60s.

8126.name: Cheap Shot
8126.short_desc: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
8126.long_desc:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.

8128.name: Dark Harvest
8128.short_desc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
8128.long_desc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

8134.name: Ingenious Hunter
8134.long_desc:
Gain 10 Item Haste plus an additional 5 Item Haste per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Item Haste affects all items with cooldowns.

8135.name: Ravenous Hunter
8135.long_desc:
Omnivamp: 1.5% per Bounty Hunter stack.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

8136.name: Zombie Ward
8136.short_desc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each Zombie Ward spawned plus bonus upon completion.
8136.long_desc:
Takedowns on enemy Wards cause friendly Zombie Wards to sprout from their corpses.

Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power for every Zombie Ward spawned, up to 10.

After spawning 10 Zombie Wards, additionally gain 10 adaptive force.

Zombie Wards are visible, last for 120s and do not count towards your ward limit.

8138.name: Eyeball Collection
8138.short_desc: Collect eyeballs for champion <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>. Gain permanent AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.
8138.long_desc:
Collect eyeballs for champion takedowns. Gain an adaptive bonus of 1.2 Attack Damage or 2 Ability Power, per eyeball collected.

Upon completing your collection at 10 eyeballs, additionally gain an adaptive bonus of 6 Attack Damage, or 10 Ability Power.

Collect 1 eyeball per champion takedown.

8139.name: Taste of Blood
8139.short_desc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.
8139.long_desc:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 18-35 (+0.2 bonus AD, +0.1 AP) health (based on level)

Cooldown: 20s

8143.name: Sudden Impact
8143.short_desc: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.
8143.long_desc:
After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you 7 Lethality and 6 Magic Penetration for 5s.

Cooldown: 4s

8210.name: Transcendence
8210.short_desc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
8210.long_desc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.

8214.name: Summon Aery
8214.short_desc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
8214.long_desc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

8224.name: Nullifying Orb
8224.short_desc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.
8224.long_desc:
When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a shield that absorbs 40 - 120 magic damage based on level (+0.1 AP and +0.15 bonus AD) for 4s.

Cooldown: 60s

8226.name: Manaflow Band
8226.short_desc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.
8226.long_desc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds

8229.name: Arcane Comet
8229.short_desc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
8229.long_desc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 100 based on level (+0.2 AP and +0.35 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.

8230.name: Phase Rush
8230.short_desc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
8230.long_desc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 15 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.
This is increased to 30 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.
Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 10s - 30s

8232.name: Waterwalking
8232.short_desc: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.
8232.long_desc:
Gain 25 Move Speed and an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level) when in the river.


May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.

8233.name: Absolute Focus
8233.short_desc: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
8233.long_desc:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.

8234.name: Celerity
8234.short_desc: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
8234.long_desc: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.

8236.name: Gathering Storm
8236.short_desc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
8236.long_desc:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...

8237.name: Scorch
8237.short_desc: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.
8237.long_desc:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 15 - 35 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s

8242.name: Unflinching
8242.short_desc: Gain a small amount of tenacity that increases with missing health.
8242.long_desc: Gain 10% Tenacity and 10% Slow Resist. These values increase by up to an additional 20% Tenacity and 20% Slow Resist based on missing health. Maximum value achieved at 30% health.

8275.name: Nimbus Cloak
8275.short_desc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.
8275.long_desc:
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 5% - 25% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).

8299.name: Last Stand
8299.short_desc: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.
8299.long_desc: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.

8304.name: Magical Footwear
8304.short_desc: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.
8304.long_desc:
You get free Slightly Magical Footwear at 12 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 45s sooner.

Slightly Magical Footwear grants you an additional 10 Move Speed.

8306.name: Hextech Flashtraption
8306.short_desc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
8306.long_desc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

8313.name: Perfect Timing
8313.short_desc:
Gain a free Commencing Stopwatch. After 14 minutes, it can be used for a one time Stasis effect.

Each takedown you get shortens this timer by 120 seconds.
8313.long_desc:
Begin the game with a Commencing Stopwatch that transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Each takedown you acquire reduces this timer by 120 seconds.

Stopwatch can be used for a one time 2.5 second Stasis effect.

8316.name: Minion Dematerializer
8316.short_desc: Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.
8316.long_desc:
Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. Minion Dematerializers are on cooldown for the first 180s of the game.

Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +6% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +3% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.

8321.name: Future's Market
8321.short_desc: You can enter debt to buy items.
8321.long_desc:
You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.

Lending Fee: 50 gold

8345.name: Biscuit Delivery
8345.short_desc: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
8345.long_desc:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 2 mins, until 6 min.

Biscuits restore 10% of your missing health and mana. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your mana cap by 50.

Manaless: Champions without mana restore 12% missing health instead.

8351.name: Glacial Augment
8351.short_desc: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.
8351.long_desc:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for 2s. The slow increases in strength over its duration.
  • Ranged: Ranged attacks slow by up to 30% - 40%
  • Melee: Melee attacks slow by up to 45% - 55%

    • Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for 5s, slowing all units inside by 60%.

    Cooldown: 7-4s per unit

8352.name: Time Warp Tonic
8352.short_desc: Potions and biscuits grant some restoration immediately. Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>  while under their effects.
8352.long_desc: Consuming a potion or biscuit grants 50% of its health or mana restoration immediately. In addition, gain 5% Move Speed while under their effects.

8358.name: Prototype: Omnistone
8358.short_desc: Periodically grants a single use of another random keystone.
8358.long_desc:
Periodically grants a single use of another random keystone.

5-3 second cooldown between using a keystone and gaining the next. (9-7 seconds for ranged users)


After 40 seconds of not using a given keystone, Omnistone will re-roll when you exit champion combat.
Aftershock is only available to champions who have learned a basic spell that can trigger it.
Predator is only available to champions who have already purchased boots.

8360.name: Unsealed Spellbook
8360.short_desc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
8360.long_desc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.
Smite damage increases after two Summoner Spell swaps.

8401.name: Shield Bash
8401.short_desc: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.
8401.long_desc:
While shielded, gain 1 - 10 Armor and Magic Resist based on Level.

Whenever you gain a new shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals 5 - 30 (+1.5% Bonus Health) (+8.5% New Shield Amount) bonus adaptive damage.

You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.

8410.name: Approach Velocity
8410.short_desc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby enemy champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>, increased for enemy champions that you impair.
8410.long_desc:
Gain 7.5% Move Speed towards nearby enemy champions that are movement impaired. This bonus is increased to 15% Move Speed for any enemy champion that you impair.

Activation Range for CC from allies: 1000

8429.name: Conditioning
8429.short_desc: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
8429.long_desc: After 12 min gain +9 Armor and +9 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.

8437.name: Grasp of the Undying
8437.short_desc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
8437.long_desc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of your max health
  • Heals you for 2% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5

    • Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained reduced by 40%.

8439.name: Aftershock
8439.short_desc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
8439.long_desc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)

8444.name: Second Wind
8444.short_desc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
8444.long_desc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health +6 over 10s.

8446.name: Demolish
8446.short_desc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.
8446.long_desc:
Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over 3s, while within 600 range of it. The charged attack deals 100 (+35% of your max health) bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 45s

8451.name: Overgrowth
8451.short_desc: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
8451.long_desc:
Absorb life essence from monsters or enemy minions that die near you, permanently gaining 3 maximum health for every 8.

When you've absorbed 120 monsters or enemy minions, gain an additional 3.5% maximum health.

8453.name: Revitalize
8453.short_desc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
8453.long_desc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.

8463.name: Font of Life
8463.short_desc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.
8463.long_desc:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for 4s.

Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for 5 + 1% of your max health over 2s.

8465.name: Guardian
8465.short_desc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
8465.long_desc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 70 - 40 seconds
Shield: 70 - 150 + 15% of your ability power + 9% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 90 - 250 postmitigation damage

8473.name: Bone Plating
8473.short_desc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s
8473.long_desc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 less damage.


Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 45s

9101.name: Overheal
9101.short_desc: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.
9101.long_desc:
Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to 10 (+10% Max Health).

Shield is built up from 20 to 100% of excess healing from yourself or any ally.

9103.name: Legend: Bloodline
9103.short_desc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.
9103.long_desc:
Gain 0.6% lifesteal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

9104.name: Legend: Alacrity
9104.long_desc:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

9105.name: Legend: Tenacity
9105.long_desc:
Gain 5% tenacity plus an additional 2.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

9111.name: Triumph
9111.short_desc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.
9111.long_desc:
Takedowns restore 12% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner

9923.name: Hail of Blades
9923.short_desc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
9923.long_desc:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 12s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
